Then, spread the formula all over, performing a delicate massage by drawing circular as well as upward motions. After a few minutes, rinse the foam off with room temperature water, removing all residue.

description:
bioten Skin Moisture Micellar Cleansing Gel 200ml (6.76fl oz) is the perfect cleansing solution to add to your caring routine if you are looking for an efficient yet nourishing formula. Suitable for normal to combination skin, this unique product is able to remove all traces of impurities and makeup-up without overdrying the skin. Therefore, after each use, your complexion will be feeling both clean and comfortable.
This nourishing and refreshing action is possible thanks to an advanced composition that blends the power of natural ingredients with active components. First of all, the 100% sustainable Quince Extract present in the formula helps to smooth the epidermis and boost moisture retention.
Simultaneously, this product also contains Prebiotics in order to promote a balanced skin flora and an overall healthy look. Even more, the Hydro Nutrient Complex equally present prevents dehydration and provides instant moisture and comfort.
Last but not least, this product is part of the bioten Skin Moisture face care system, a line of products that focuses specifically on providing optimal levels of moisture to the skin. Furthermore, this product follows the brand's guidelines regarding sustainability, as well. Besides having 91% of ingredients from a natural source, the bioten Skin Moisture Micellar Cleansing Gel is a vegan-friendly formula that comes in completely recyclable packaging.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use bioten Skin Moisture Micellar Cleansing Gel 200ml (6.76fl oz) as the first step of your cleansing routine. Apply to damp skin, massaging gently until it lathers. Then, rinse thoroughly.

description: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Micellar Water Ultra Oily Skin is a cleansing micellar water which removes 99% of make-up with the first cotton pad including eye and lips. This cleansing water is suitable for oily to combination skin, as it contains zinc to purify and remove excess sebum. The skin feels fresh and cleansed, without any dryness associated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Roche-Posay Effaclar Micellar Water Ultra Oily Skin onto a cotton pad and cleanse the skin until all impurities are removed. No need to rinse after.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Aveda Outer Peace Foaming Cleanser 125ml (4.2 fl oz) is a vegan cleanser that removes all kinds of makeup and impurities. As a result, it deeply cleanses the pores. Yet, thanks to its foaming texture it provides a gentle cleansing routine that soothes the skin. This product is rich in powerful plant extracts such as Tamanu, Amla, Boswellia and Saw Palmetto. These extracts make sure to dissolve any excess oil from the skin, making this cleanser a great product for acne-prone skin.
Aveda's mission has sustainability at heart and is plant infused. Therefore, not only are their products vegan but manufactured through 100% wind and solar power.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Aveda Outer Peace Foaming Cleanser 125ml (4.2 fl oz) in the morning and evening. Firstly, take one to two pumps onto the hand or a wet washcloth. Then, gently wash the face and neck. Finally, rinse thoroughly.

description:
Noreva Exfoliac Micellar Water Cleanser Make-Up Remover 400ml (13.4 fl oz) is a daily cleanser with both makeup removal and exfoliating action. This micellar water is specially designed for combination to oily skin and blemish-prone skin given its composition. That said, this cleanser contains purifying and sebum-regulating ingredients, namely Salicylic acid and Zinc gluconate, that help regulate excess sebum. At the same time, Salicylic acid does a gentle exfoliation on the skin, helping to unclog pores. In fact, this product is gentle on the skin resorting to mild tensioactives for a cleansing action that is also effective at removing makeup. Additionally, it contains a moisturizing ingredient called Zemea to keep the skin hydrated and therefore does not have a drying effect.
Furthermore, this cleanser is suitable to use daily on the face, eyes, and lips to completely remove makeup. In the end, the skin is clean, purified, and indeed, less oily with a mattified complexion. With a fresh and delicate fragrance the skin feels refreshed!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Noreva Exfoliac Micellar Water Cleanser Make-Up Remover 400ml (13.4 fl oz) on the face, eyes, and lips using a soft cotton pad or reusable alternative in the morning and evening.

description: L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Classic Facial Cleansing Milk smoothes and relaxes more mature skin thanks to a revitalizing form of Magnesium. In fact, this ingredient joins forces with Vitamin Cg to energize dull skin, refreshing it and preventing further dryness. In the end, the epidermis becomes more clear as well as softer/extra fortified. Thus, this skincare essential also enhances its defensive barrier against all sorts of external threats such as damaging free radicals. Ideal for women over 50 years old, this produces results wonderful results just after four weeks of regular applications. To get the most each usage, simply place a nice portion of milk on a cotton pad and spread it gently all over your face. All in all, this wonderful anti-aging option tends to increase the skin’s firmness while also offering greater elasticity.
how_to_use:
How to use
Place a generous amount of L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Classic Facial Cleansing Milk onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, spread the formula gently all over your face and perform circular as well as upward motions to distribute it as evenly as possible. Don't forget to extend the application to your neck area for optimal results. Finally, rinse abundantly with water and follow this cleansing solution with a serum, moisturizer, or eye-contouring product.

description:
Clarins Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser is a fragrant and comfortable facial cleanser that removes impurities and makeup. The texture is soft and creamy, particularly suited for normal to dry skin types, contributing to preserving the healthy microbiota of the skin.
A blend of powerful botanicals is the secret for a complete cleanser that leaves the skin free from makeup, impurities and pollutants. Organic alpine plant extracts of golden gentian and lemon balm, part of Clarins' Gentle Complex, contribute to soften the skin, allowing an ultra-gentle cleansing experience. Likewise, moringa helps to dissolve and remove makeup as well as impurities and pollutants. At the same time, Aloe vera helps to soothe and deeply hydrate the skin while Saponaria allows the formula to naturally lather without adding soap and sodium lauryl sulfate to the formula. As a result, the formula perfectly cleanses the skin, eliminating impurities and makeup residue while leaving the skin soft, clean and extremely comfortable.
how_to_use:
How to use
Work the Clarins Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser onto your hands with some water in order to create a lather. Then, apply it onto the skin and massage it evenly onto the face and neck. Press and lift your hands on the face repeatedly to lift off all the impurities, pollution particles and makeup. Rinse it off thoroughly and pat the skin dry. Lastly, apply your favorite toner and facial moisturizer.

description: Cetaphil Pro Oil Control Foam Wash is a purifying face wash especially created for oily and acne-prone skin. Formulated with a unique zinc complex, this product combines the properties of zinc gluconate and zinc coceth sulfate in order to provides a deep cleanse that respects the skin's natural balance. The mild foam clears away excess oil and sebum, all the while cleansing the pores in-depth and ridding them of trapped impurities. After washing, the product rinses off easily, unveiling soft and smooth skin that retains its healthy levels of hydration.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

A unique zinc complex, comprised of zinc gluconate and zinc coceth sulfate, absorbs excess oil while providing a deep pore cleanse.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Cetaphil Pro Oil Control Foam Wash to damp skin, twice a day, then massage gently. Finally, rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with the eyes.

description: Dr. Hauschka Cleansing Cream is a truly natural cleansing paste, which is suitable for all skin types. Combined with the press and roll technique, it provides a gentle but effective cleansing, which respects the needs of dry skins but also refreshes oily skins. With this in mind, the formula maintains the hydrolipidic layer, preparing the skin for the next skincare steps. The botanical blend of plant extracts like calendula, chamomile and St. John's wort revitalizes the skin in order to achieve a brighter complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Cleansing Cream by following the press and roll cleansing method. First, dampen the skin and mix 1-2cm of the product with a bit of water in your palm in order to form a creamy paste. Then, apply the paste to the face by pressing it to the skin, avoiding the eye contour. Lastly, use a gentle rolling motion to activate the skin and remove with warm water.

description: Flormar Eye Makeup Remover Flormar Eye Makeup Remover is a lightweight formula that removes even waterproof makeup. This is a two-phased makeup remover, which means that its composition is a mix between oil and water. Therefore, while the oil gently breaks-down even the most stubborn makeup, the water cleanses and nourishes the skin guaranteeing a soft non-greasy finish. In other words, the Flormar Eye Makeup Remover is an effective and quick way to easily remove eye makeup, leaving your eye area feeling soft and fresh.
how_to_use:
How to use
Gently apply Flormar Eye Makeup Remover with a cloth on the eye area. Shake well before use.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Clarins Total Cleansing Oil is particularly designed to thoroughly remove long-wearing and waterproof makeup with ease. In case, being an oil, it helps remove even the most stubborn makeup. That said, the texture is a highlight of this product and provides a delightful and effective cleansing experience. It features a light, soft oil texture that transforms into luxurious milk upon contact with water for easy rinsing. This will easily help remove all traces of makeup, thus ensuring perfectly cleansed skin that feels soft and refreshed. Furthermore, the formula features the [Gentle Complex], which includes organic extracts of yellow gentian and lemon balm, specifically chosen to soothe and soften the skin.
The formula also incorporates a blend of powerful botanicals known for their beneficial skin properties. Rosemary extract, traditionally used for its purifying and antioxidant benefits, works alongside moringa extract, known for its ability to remove pollution particles. Moreover, organic apricot oil and sunflower seed oil, rich in fatty acids, nourish the skin while also contributing to the makeup removal effect. In summary, this cleansing oil is the ideal solution for removing all waterproof makeup for anyone looking for a total cleansing experience. It's now available in a more eco-friendly presentation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Total Cleansing Oil to dry skin and massage. Then, add some water to emulsify and massage again. Rinse well.

description:
Eve Lom Cleanser is Eve Lom's iconic and award-winning bestseller, selling one unit every 30 seconds all around the world. This is a luxurious multi-benefit cleansing balm that cleanses the skin while delivering many benefits. Indeed, Eve Lom believes that cleansing is the foundation of beautiful skin, and this product provides the perfect cleanse. Its sumptuous texture melts on the skin without obstructing the pores, removing every trace of dirt and makeup, including waterproof. The relaxing scent of the plant oils, combined with the ritual of massaging the skin, makes for a spa-like application. The skin becomes exceptionally clean without feeling tight. It was clinically proven that the skin was moisturized for 12 hours after the application of this balm.
Nonetheless, this cult product offers even more. The combination of aromatic plant oils delivers decongesting, toning, and soothing effects. So, blemishes are reduced and the skin becomes soft, more even, and rebalanced. Even more, this product comes with a muslin cleansing cloth made of 100% extra fine cotton, complementing the spa-like experience. This cloth is used to remove the product, delivering yet another benefit to the skin by gently exfoliating it and refining its texture. 
All in all, this cleansing balm is ideal for the first step of a double cleanse, and every skin type can enjoy its benefits. It leaves the skin feeling soft, moisturized, toned, and perfectly cleansed.
how_to_use:
How to use
First, place an almond-sized amount of Eve Lom Cleanser onto the hands and rub them together to warm the product. Then, apply it to dry skin. Massage the skin using circular motions to thoroughly cleanse it, removing any dirt and/or makeup. Wet the muslin cloth using warm water and rub it on the skin to remove excess balm. Finally, rinse the cloth with cold water and press it into the skin for a cooling effect.

description:
Embryolisse Foaming Cream-Milk 200ml (6.76 fl oz) combines cleansing properties and nourishing benefits in one product to leave the skin feeling refreshed and hydrated. That said, this product has an incredible texture! The creamy milk texture envelops the skin in a veil of softness and comfort. But it has a foaming action to effectively yet still gently clean the skin. In this way, it eliminates daily impurities, leaving your complexion impeccably clean. At the same time, the formula is enriched with Prickly pear extract and a blend of biolipids, rich in fatty acids and phytosterols, to moisturize the skin. As a result, this cleanser cleans the skin while providing it with optimal hydration.
Furthermore, you can use it to clean both the face and the body and the formula is vegan and soap-free, delivering the utmost respect for the skin. That said, this cleanser caters to all skin types, including sensitive. All in all, the creamy goodness and gentle foam of this cleanser will whisk away impurities and leave the skin clean, soft, and comfortable.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Embryolisse Foaming Cream-Milk 200ml (6.76 fl oz) to damp skin and massage. Then, rinse thoroughly.

description: Noreva Psoriane Soothing Cleansing Gel gently cleanses the skin, limiting its dryness through moisturizing active ingredients. This gel has keratolytic components and will instantly smoothe the skin and promote the removal of flaky patches. Also, it contains a powerful soothing complex, CalmiPSO, that acts on pro-inflammatory factors. All in all, it provides a reduced surface area and density of red patches, reduced flaky patches in the psoriasis area as well as reduced pruritus. When dermatologically tested, 100% of testers found that after 14 days of once-daily use, their skin was less itchy, less red and less flaky. Thanks to its moisturizing and soothing active ingredients this product guarantees very high tolerance. Suitable for children and adults.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Noreva Psoriane Soothing Cleansing Gel to damp skin. Massage. Lastly, rinse thoroughly. For daily use on both face and body.

description: Clean & Clear Advantage Spot Control Daily Wash 150ml (5.1 fl oz) is a daily wash that controls and clears the spots fast. Clogged pores can result in breakouts, so dealing with them is essential. Due to this wash's fast-acting patented spot-fighting technology, besides cleansing and unclogging, this product also prevents future spots and attenuates blemishes. Moreover, with Cedarwood, Cinnamon Oil and Moss Rose, this product reduces excess sebum, which is a reason for clogged pores. As such, it leaves the skin beautiful and clear without over-drying it. You can expect a clean face without any dirt or dead skin cells.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, wet your face. Secondly, squeeze Clean & Clear Advantage Spot Control Daily Wash 150ml (5.1 fl oz) into your palm. Then, gently massage it all over the face in circular motions and avoid the eye area. Lastly, rinse thoroughly and pat dry using a towel.

description: Dermalogica Special Cleansing Gel 250ml (8.4 fl oz) is a cleansing solution suitable for all skin types. In fact, this soap-free formula resorts to Quillaja Saponaria, a naturally-foaming ingredient, to gently cleanse the skin without creating a tight after-feel. Furthermore, due to the presence of Balm mint and Lavender, this gel provides a soothing action during the cleansing process, leaving the skin soft and calm. Last but not least, this cleanser has a refreshing gel texture that transforms into foam when in contact with water. As a result, it thoroughly removes all impurities and debris without overdrying the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Dermalogica Special Cleansing Gel 250ml (8.4 fl oz) to the wet skin of both face and neck. Then, massage gently to remove impurities and rinse thoroughly. Lastly, dry gently and without rubbing.

description:
Noreva Actipur Cleansing Gel 400ml is a unique cleansing solution that was specially developed to purify the complexion without stripping it completely. Ideal for combination to oily skin, this formula is perfect for not only removing daily impurities but regulating sebum production, as well. Moreover, by resorting to Soothing Surfactants, the Noreva Actipur Cleansing Gel cleanses the skin while still respecting its natural balance. In fact, this soap-free composition has a physiological pH, which means it does not cause irritation or dry out the skin while thoroughly cleansing it. 
In addition to its caring benefits, the Noreva Actipur Cleansing Gel is equally easy and pleasant to use. Its refreshing gel texture becomes a luxurious soft foam when in contact with water. Even more, with a delicate fragrance, the Noreva Actipur Cleansing Gel is suitable for both the face and the body.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients 
 
Soothing Surfactants efficiently cleanse the skin without drying it out completely or causing irritation.
how_to_use:
How to use 
The Noreva Actipur Cleansing Gel 400ml is suitable for both the face and body. Use it in the shower or as part of your regular morning and evening routine, as the first step. Apply an appropriate amount to damp skin. Then, massage gently with circular motions. Finish by rinsing thoroughly. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Cleanser Water Gel is an innovative gel cleanser that activates with water to remove impurities and make-up. Fit for all skin types, including sensitive, this cleanser is enrichened with hyaluronic acid, a powerful ally in attracting and retaining moisture in the skin. The skin is gently cleansed and hydrated, leaving it supple and plush to the touch.
how_to_use:
How to use
Massage Neutrogena Hydro Boost Cleanser Water Gel onto wet skin. Rinse thoroughly afterwards.

description:
A-Derma Biology Make-Up Remover Lotion Hydra-Cleansing is a facial cleanser for fragile skin that gently removes makeup and also cleanses the skin. With a comforting milky and non-sticky texture, this cleanser is ideal for daily use on fragile skin. This product replaces the original A-Derma Sensifluid Cleansing Lotion now with a new and improved formulation.
This cleanser combines 99% of ingredients of natural origin in order to create a gentle formula that offers optimal tolerance. Organic Rhealba® oat works to hydrating fragile skin and bring the skin back to its balance. At the same time, dandelion extract protects the skin with a powerful anti-pollution action. As a result, this complete formula manages not only to gently cleanse but also remove makeup from the face and eyes, respecting fragile skin and contributing to keep hydrating and balance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of A-Derma Biology Make-Up Remover Lotion Hydra-Cleansing onto the face, and then massage to dissolve impurities and makeup. Lastly, remove the product with a cotton pad or with a damp cloth.

description: Benzacare Spotcontrol Purifying Cleansing Foam Acne-Prone Skin provides you with extra care in your skincare routine. Thus, this cleansing foam is ideal for acne-prone skin as it washes deeply, purifies and controls oiliness. In other words, this product eliminates impurities from the skin as well as helping to unclog pores. On the other hand, it improves the skin's shine and smoothness without drying it out. Furthermore, even the most sensitive skins will have no feeling of discomfort or even a tugging sensation. All this thanks to the gentle formula of this foam, as it contains ingredients suitable for this type of skin. In short, this foam cleans the skin deeply so that it is free from impurities and excess oil.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Benzacare Spotcontrol Purifying Cleansing Foam Acne-Prone Skin daily, as part of your morning and evenig routine. Apply on your wet skin from the face and neck, performing a circular massage. Then rinse thoroughly./p>

description:
bioten Detox Micellar Cleansing Gel 200ml (6.76fl oz) was specially developed to efficiently cleanse and purify normal to oily skin. Thanks to its unique composition, this cleansing solution ensures a detoxifying action that reenergizes and illuminates your complexion.  
To begin with, the formula has 100% natural Charcoal, an ingredient with powerful absorbent properties that targets excess sebum. Like so, the Detox Micellar Cleansing Gel is able to trap impurities, make-up and oil like a magnet, leaving the skin perfectly clean after each application. 
At the same time, this gel contributes to optimal moisture levels. In fact, although extremely efficient when it comes to cleansing, this product does not overdry the skin. On the contrary, the Hydro Nutrient Complex present in the composition prevents skin dehydration and supplies an instant comforting effect, as well. 
Last but not least, the Detox Micellar Cleansing Gel also contains Prebiotics, a component that promotes a balanced skin flora and has a crucial role when it comes to achieving an overall healthier look.
To finish, the bioten Detox Micellar Cleansing Gel follows the brand's guidelines regarding sustainability. In addition to having 95% of ingredients from a natural source, it has a vegan-friendly formula that comes in completely recyclable packaging.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply bioten Detox Micellar Cleansing Gel 200ml (6.76fl oz) an appropriate amount onto damp skin, massaging gently. Avoid the eye area. Then, finish by rinsing thoroughly.

description:
Erborian Centella Cleansing Gel is a gentle facial cleanser that removes impurities while soothing and hydrating the skin. The formula is so delicate that is suitable for all skin types as well as compatible with the eye area.
Containing a blend of botanical extracts, the formula intensively cleanses the skin. The star-ingredient is Centella Asiatica, an extract that provides the skin with an immediate and long-lasting soothing effect. In addition, squalane deeply moisturizes and prevents dehydration while a 7 Herbs complex helps to soothe and also to improve natural skin detoxification. Each application leaves the skin incredibly clean without making it feel tight. The skin is then free from impurities and ready for your moisturizer!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Erborian Centella Cleansing Gel onto damp skin and massage in circular motions. Then, rinse off thoroughly and follow with your favorite moisturizer. The formula is suitable for the eye area. Use it alone or as a second cleanse after an oil-based cleanser.

description: SVR PALPEBRAL By Topialyse Eye Makeup Remover Gel was specially formulated to gently cleanse dry, irritated, and/or sensitive eyelids. Its minimalist formula is able to perfectly cleanse, refresh, and soothe the eye area with a simple gesture. Containing Niacinamide, a powerful ingredient that has anti-inflammatory properties and the ability to increase ceramide synthesis it enhances skin hydration and promotes a healthier skin barrier helping reduce symptoms of discomfort such as dryness, itching, and irritation. Its pleasant gel texture not only allows a gentle removal of accumulated impurities and make-up, including waterproof make-up but also lends the skin a pleasant feeling of freshness that calms and soothes the eye contour. You can apply it with your fingertips or with the help of a cotton pad and you just need to leave the gel for a few seconds over closed eyes and gently wipe to thoroughly cleanse and comfort the skin.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Niacinamide, also known as Vitamin B3, increases ceramide synthesis and has anti-inflammatory properties. This leads to better skin hydration and healthier skin barrier helping reduce symptoms of discomfort such as dryness, itching, and irritation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of SVR PALPEBRAL By Topialyse Eye Makeup Remover Gel to a cotton pad. If you prefer you can also apply it with the fingertips. Leave the gel for a few seconds over closed eyes. Then wipe towards the temples without rubbing.

description:
Vichy Normaderm Triactiv 3-in-1 Cleanser Scrub Mask 125ml is a multifunctional facial product. It is designed to address the needs of oily and blemish-prone skin through its three applications: as an exfoliant, a cleanser, and a mask. Firstly, as an exfoliant, it helps unclog pores and slough away dead skin cells, revealing a smoother skin surface. This step helps prevent the buildup of impurities that can lead to breakouts and blemishes. Secondly, when used as a cleanser, it helps reduce excess oiliness and purify the skin of impurities. Lastly, as a mask, it helps absorb excess sebum and minimize the appearance of enlarged pores.
This product incorporates 25% kaolin clay, an ingredient known to absorb excess sebum. Additionally, the combination of salicylic and glycolic acids helps prevent the appearance of blemishes and achieve a more even skin texture. All in all, this 3-in-1 product offers a practical yet effective approach to managing oily and acne-prone skin. It simplifies the skincare regimen while ensuring effective results, for a clearer, more balanced complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
To use Vichy Normaderm Triactiv 3-in-1 Cleanser Scrub Mask 125ml as a cleanser or scrub: apply an appropriate amount of product to wet skin of the face. Gently massage the skin and thoroughly cleanse. Alternatively, to use it as a mask (about once a week), apply a thin layer onto clean and dry skin of the face, avoiding the eye and lip areas. Then, leave it on for 5 minutes before thoroughly cleansing.

description:
Lierac The Cleansing Milk gently yet effectively cleans the skin without requiring rinsing. In fact, this product removes both makeup and impurities with a single gesture. Meanwhile, this product has a vegan and natural formula with 97% ingredients of natural origin. This formula is infused with a Marine Prebiotic Complex which helps to preserve the skin microbiome while cleaning the skin. For this purpose, this complex comprises three main ingredients that provide essential nutrition to the skin microbiota and therefore, contribute to maintaining a balanced microbiome. At the same time, the formula provides nutrition and its velvety texture envelops the skin with softness. Moreover, thanks to its gentle formula, this product is suitable for both the face and eyes and for all skin types.
In other words, this cleansing milk not only removes makeup and cleanses the skin but also nourishes it providing it with immediate comfort. In other words, the skin is left clean, comfortable, and nourished.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Marine Prebiotic Complex comprises three active ingredients namely sea water, green and brown algae, and sugar. Firstly, sea water is rich in minerals and trace minerals which are important to the skin microbiome. Secondly, green and brown algae are sources of sugars and amino acids that provide nutrients to the bacteria on the skin. And lastly, sugar maintains a good environment for bacteria. All in all, this complex provides essential nutrients adapted to the needs of skin microbiota to keep a balanced microbiome.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac The Cleansing Milk with a cotton pad or reusable alternative to the face and eyes. Swipe gently to remove impurities and makeup. Do not rinse. Use both in the morning and evening.

description:
Bioderma Sébium Hydra Cleanser Soothing Cleansing Balm 200ml (6.7floz) stands as a solution to cleanse the skin, particularly during ultra-drying acne treatments. Its biomimetic formula and physiological pH make it a well-tolerated product and an essential for acne-prone skin fragilized by drying treatments, whether oral or topical. This cleansing balm gently cleanses while providing calming, hydrating, and comfort-restoring actions with 93% biomimetic ingredients, perfectly affinity-matched with the skin. On one hand, the cleansing action is achieved through mild cleansing agents that capture impurities in micelles, ensuring a gentle cleanse that does not strip the skin of its natural oils. In fact, 100% of users confirm this gentle cleaning action. On the other hand, this cleanser delivers 24-hour hydration with moisturizing ingredients. A biomimetic NMF-like sugar helps to hydrate the skin by replenishing water reserves while biomimetic lipids ensure comfort.
Moreover, the soothing effect is powered by the DAF complex, which increases the skin's tolerance threshold and calms irritation, making it an ideal choice for acne-prone skin undergoing drying treatments. Enveloping the skin in its balm-like texture it combines gentle cleansing with soothing and hydrating benefits. In summary, this cleanser offers a solution for those undergoing acne treatments, providing gentle cleansing, soothing relief, and 24-hour hydration and comfort.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Bioderma Sébium Hydra Cleanser Soothing Cleansing Balm 200ml (6.7floz) to damp skin and massage to lather. Then, rinse well.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Embryolisse 3-In-1 Secret Paste 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is a versatile skincare solution offering different uses with just one product. To begin with, this product can be integrated into the routine as a purifying cleanser. Secondly, it can be used as an anti-shine mask by simply applying a generous layer of the paste to the face once or twice a week, leaving it on for about 10 minutes. The paste acts as an absorbent, focusing on reducing sebum production. After rinsing with water, the skin appears detoxified, feeling fresher and rejuvenated. With consistent use, imperfections can become visibly diminished, giving the skin a more balanced appearance. Last but not least, this paste also serves as an SOS anti-blemish care. By applying the paste directly onto blemishes in the evening, it works diligently overnight to help dry out the pimple and reduce associated redness as well.
The formula boasts the inclusion of turmeric extract, chickpea powder, and yellow clay to offer all the different benefits. In summary, this paste offers a multifaceted approach to skincare with its threefold functionality. Whether combatting a sudden breakout, seeking to reduce shine, or aiming for a daily clean, this paste is a convenient choice.
how_to_use:
How to use
To clean the face, apply Embryolisse 3-In-1 Secret Paste 100ml (3.38 fl oz) to damp skin, massage, and then rinse. To use as a mask, apply a thick layer once or twice a week and leave for 10 minutes. Then, rinse. Alternatively, apply directly to the blemishes and leave overnight to use as an SOS treatment. Rinse in the next morning.

description: L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Vitamin C + Salicylic Acid Foaming Cleanser 150ml (5.07 fl oz) harnesses the brightening properties of vitamin C and the exfoliating benefits of salicylic acid to unveil brighter, more radiant skin. First and foremost, vitamin C takes center stage in the formula. This vitamin is known for its potent antioxidant and brightening properties. As such, this powerhouse ingredient illuminates the complexion. On the other hand, salicylic acid is an exfoliant that efficiently rids the skin of impurities, dead cells, and excess sebum. As a result, it minimizes pores and leaves the skin with a smoother texture. That said, this cleanser offers results since the first application as it effortlessly sweeps away impurities, ensuring no residue is left behind, just soft, clean skin. This cleanser suits all skin types, even in the case of sensitive skin. In conclusion, this product brings back your skin's radiance and paves the way for a smoother and more youthful appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Vitamin C + Salicylic Acid Foaming Cleanser 150ml (5.07 fl oz) to damp skin of the face and neck and gently massage to lather. Then, rinse well with lukewarm water.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Atashi Cellular Micellar Water 250ml (8.4fl.oz.) removes any traces of makeup from your face, including sensitive areas such as the eyes and lips. Its formula is made of 100% natural micelles, Vitamin E and Lemon Extract. These ingredients work together to not only cleanse and soften the skin but also provide an anti-aging effect, protecting the skin from damage caused by environmental aggressions. In fact, they purify the skin and stimulate collagen production. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to boost its synthesis.
On another note, this micellar water absorbs easily into the skin, toning it and restoring its brightness.
In this way, the skin is purified without feeling sticky or tight. Its ultra-gentle formula makes it suitable to remove makeup from the most senstive and driest skin. Moreover, it has been dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested. In the end, it soothes the skin providing a moment of comfort.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Atashi Cellular Micellar Water 250ml (8.4fl.oz.) in the morning and evening. Apply it with a cotton pad, without rinsing.

description:
Arganicare Aloe Hydra 2-in-1 Foaming Cleanser 225ml (7.5 fl oz) is a face lotion that both removes impurities from the skin while also refreshing it. Ideal for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
Aloe Vera, its main ingredient, is rich in antioxidants. As a result, the skin will feel instantly refreshed and soothed but never dry. Therefore, this product is suitable both as a facial cleanser, preparing the skin to receive a moisturizer and make-up afterward, or even as a make-up remover. In either case, the skin will feel soft and clean, with its characteristic radiant and youthful glow back.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Aloe Vera has rich antibacterial and anti-inflammatory components, therefore helping the skin to regenerate itself. In addition, with its humectant and emollient properties, it is also a very gentle moisturizer, commonly used to hydrate the skin without damaging its barrier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Arganicare Aloe Hydra 2-in-1 Foaming Cleanser 225ml (7.5 fl oz) on still-damp skin and gently massage it with circular movements, avoiding the eye area. Afterward, rinse it thoroughly with cold water and dry the skin with a gentle non-abrasive towel.

description: Revlon Professional Revlonissimo Technics Color Clean Cleanser 250ml (8.45fl oz) is a professional cleanser designed to safely remove hair dye from the skin. In particular, this product guarantees premium color services that are completely gentle on the skin, making it as comfortable and healthy as possible. In this case, it prevents the skin from being stained by hair dyes, even those with high coverage. So, by just using a cotton-wool ball, this cleanser becomes a very practical and easy-to-use solution. In the end, just wash the skin with water and that's it, it's guaranteed to be cleaner and without any kind of stains.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use
This product was developed for professional use only and should not, therefore, be used at home. Remove stains with Revlon Professional Revlonissimo Technics Color Clean Cleanser 250ml (8.45fl oz) before rinsing the color from the hair. First, moisten the cotton-wool ball with this lotion and gently rub on the stains. Emulsify and rinse everything.

description: Uriage Thermal Micellar Water Sensitive Skin is a cleansing water that removes make-up and impurities from sensitive and redness-prone skin. Formulated with Non-Ionic Surfactants, which effectively dislodge make-up and impurities, and Uriage Thermal Water, which soothes the skin and relieves sensations of discomfort, this product purifies the skin and provides long-lasting hydration, all the while calming the skin and attenuating redness. The complexion instantly regains comfort and softness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Thermal Micellar Water Sensitive Skin to the face using a soaked cotton pad. Gently wipe over the face, eyes and neck to cleanse the skin. Do not rinse.

description: Bioderma Hydrabio H2O Moisturising Micelle Solution is a daily cleanser specially formulated to tend to the needs of dehydrated and sensitive skin. It not only gently cleanses the skin from impurities and make-up but also helps hydrate and soothe. With the Aquagenium™ Complex, this micellar water can enhance skin hydration and also promote a healthier skin barrier. It not only leads to better skin hydration but also comforts and soothes the skin. And, due to the Micellar Technology, it can also gently but effectively remove impurities and make-up while respecting the skin’s natural protective film. All in all, it lends the skin a pleasant feeling of cleanliness, hydration, and comfort and offers a quick and practical way to gently but effectively cleanse the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Bioderma Hydrabio H2O Moisturising Micelle Solution  to a cotton pad. Gently wipe the face and eye area and repeat the process if necessary. It does not require rinsing with water.

description:
Diadermine Hydrating Micellar Water is a micellar water that helps you remove makeup from your eyes, face and lips effectively, gently and in order to care for your skin. In turn, this micellar water also helps to remove impurities and traces of dirt from your skin. Furthermore, during facial cleansing, this product allows the skin to maintain its level of hydration and thus stay revitalized, radiant, fresher and cleaner.
Regarding the composition of this product, it contains 93% natural ingredients. In addition, it contains small particles that trap and remove dirt from the face thus helping to clean the skin effectively but gently. On the other hand, this product contains Aloe Vera and Panthenol in order to purify the skin without drying it out. Finally, your facial skin is left without any traces of make-up, cleaner, hydrated and smoothed.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Diadermine Hydrating Micellar Water with the help of a cotton pad soaked in this solution. Apply it all over your face and neck in the morning and evening to remove impurities, dirt and makeup.

description: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser clears all skin types delicately but deeply, casting away all sorts of daily impurities. Thus, this everyday essential balances even the most sensitive complexions due to its acidic pH level. In fact, the formula rids the skin of blemishes and imperfections without causing irritation or redness. All in all, it speeds up the epidermis renewal while still preserving the skin's natural moisture barrier. To the same extent, shielding from free radicals and external threats ends up enhancing the skin's overall condition. Moreover, you'll notice immediate improvements after each application, leading to a refreshing finish. In short, it helps block various environmental aggression at the same time it removes excess sebum. To sum up, extra luminous, clean, and awakened skin cells are ready to thrive on any occasion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser twice a day, during the morning and evening. After placing the gel on the palm of your hand wait for it to foam up. Then massage all over your face, performing circular and upward motions with your hands. However, stay away from the sensitive eye/mouth sections. Finally, rinse it off with as much care as possible, resorting to warm water.

description: Comodynes Make-up Remover Micellar Solution Dry Skin is an innovative make-up remover suitable for normal to dry skin, including sensitive. Combining the properties of a cleanser and a moisturizer in a single product, this extra-soft towelette is moistened with a micellar solution with high skin tolerance, which eliminates impurities and make-up without disturbing the skin's natural balance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Massage Comodynes Make-up Remover Micellar Solution Dry Skin onto face and eyes for 1 minute to remove impurities and make-up. No need to rinse afterwards.

description:
Mádara Melting Cleansing Oil clears your facial skin and ultimately hydrates as well as detoxifies, removing make-up, long-lasting foundation, or mineral sunscreen. Thanks to several delicate ingredients like Vitamin E, Evening Primrose, and Almond oils impurities are cast away without endangering the skin's natural protective barrier. In the end, you'll feel refreshed, as your complexion is ready to absorb the qualities of other beauty products. In fact, this lightweight oil is specially made for drier skin types that experience daily stress and deal with environmental aggressions regularly. Therefore, these are more fragile and susceptible to aging signs as well as overall dullness. 
As it melts, this 100% natural cleansing oil smoothes the rougher top layers of the skin and maximizes luminosity. Soon, you'll notice a much welcomed feather-like finish. After coming in contact with water, the formula's texture becomes soft, making it easy to apply and rinse off, at the same time. More precisely, its use tends to become rather addictive, as you realize the skin gets the treatment it deserves. At last, nourishment, protection, and long-lasting hydration lead to a perfect outcome of radiance as well as intensive cleansing. Clinically approved, while also preserving sustainability, transparency, and affordability, like the rest of Mádara's cosmetics, it shields the planet's well-being. Indeed the conscious extraction of natural resources is as important as producing optimal results in the world of skincare.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small portion of Mádara Melting Cleansing Oil and delicately massage on dry or wet skin. Do so in circular upward motions until you feel the face is fully cleansed. Rinse off the product thoroughly. Then, if you wish use other Mádara cosmetics to complete your beauty regime.

description: Sensilis Ritual Care Bi-Phasic Eye And Lip Makeup Remover is a two-phase cleanser that removes even waterproof make-up from both the eyes and lips. Because it's formulated with a soothing blend of bamboo and cotton extracts, this product is perfect for these sensitive areas of the face. It removes waterproof make-up without leaving any residue, therefore preparing your skin for the next step of your beauty routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Shake Sensilis Ritual Care Bi-Phasic Eye And Lip Makeup Remover well before use. Apply the product to the eye and lip areas using a cotton pad.

description: YOUTH LAB Daily Cleanser Normal Skin is a rich foaming and gentle cleansing gel that removes impurities and make-up, without disturbing the natural moisture balance of normal and dry skin types. The delicate vegan formula restores the skin's radiance and brightness, provides instant hydration, and regulates the skin's production of oil/sebum. The skin emerges cleansed, purified, and beautifully supple, with no sign of dryness or dehydration.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of YOUTH LAB Daily Cleanser Normal Skin to the skin of the face and neck. Massage with gently circular movements. Leave on for up to 1 minute for maximum results. Rinse off with water.

description: Filorga Micellar Solution Face & Eyes Fragrance-Free is a gentle daily cleanser enriched with moisturizing and soothing ingredients. Suitable for all skin types, this micellar solution is able to not only gently cleanse the skin from impurities and makeup but also hydrate and soothe the skin. With Rhamnosoft, which has anti-inflammatory and also soothing properties it helps comfort and protect the skin. With Trehalose, which has water-binding properties it helps intensely moisturize the skin and provide long-lasting hydration. And, due to the Micellar Technology, it can also gently but effectively remove impurities and makeup while respecting the skin’s natural protective film. All in all, it offers a quick and practical way to gently but effectively cleanse the skin and lend it a pleasant feeling of moisture and comfort.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Filorga Micellar Solution Face & Eyes Fragrance-Free to a cotton pad. Gently wipe the face and eye area and repeat the process if necessary.

description: Galénic Pur 2-in-1 Face & Eye Make-Up Remover is a cleansing milk-lotion used to remove impurities and make-up from face and eyes in a single gesture. Its effectiveness and softness are achieved with micellar microstructures, which transport the cleansing ingredients to the impurities on the skin. Sebum and make-up get imprisoned in the center of the micelles, while the Melilotus Floral Water gently cleanses and reduces skin irritations. The skin gets slightly fragranced, fresh and smooth.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Galénic Pur 2-in-1 Face & Eye Make-Up Remover on the face, neck, and eye area with a cotton pad or fingertips, with gentle circular movements. Remove the excess with a cotton pad.

description:
Clarins Velvet Cleansing Milk is an exquisite makeup remover designed for those who cherish both comfort and gentleness in their skincare routine. This luxurious cleansing milk effortlessly removes makeup from the face, eyes, and lips, along with impurities and traces of pollution, consequently leaving the skin feeling supple and refreshed. Its formula features the [Gentle Complex], which includes organic extracts of yellow gentian and lemon balm, chosen for their soothing and softening properties. Additionally, the formula contains moringa extract which promotes the elimination of pollution particles for a purified complexion.
The creamy, comforting milk texture not only cleanses but also ensures the skin remains soft and comfortable after use. Moreover, this cleanser is specially formulated to be gentle enough for use on the face, eyes, and lips, making it a versatile addition to any skincare regimen. Whether you're looking to remove light makeup or something more intense, this cleansing milk is up to the task. In summary, this cleansing milk offers a harmonious blend of cleansing efficacy and comforting benefits to remove makeup, pollution, and impurities, leaving the skin feeling clean and soft. It's available in different formats, including an eco-refill.
how_to_use:
How to use
Warm the product in your hands and apply Clarins Velvet Cleansing Milk to dry skin of the face, eyes, lips, and neck. Apply with light pressure and then quickly lift the fingertips off the skin.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
A-Derma Biology Hydra-Protecting Dermatological Cleansing Foam 150ml (5.07floz) meets the needs specifically of fragile skin. With this in mind, it features a fragrance and soap-free formula with optimal tolerance. Besides, it is tested under dermatological and ophthalmological control. In this way, it is suitable for all skin types, including the most sensitive ones and allergy-prone skin. That said, the natural formula, with 99% ingredients of natural origin, features Rhealba® Oat sap, and Dandelion extract. As such, this product not only gently cleans the skin but also provides soothing, hydrating, and anti-pollution properties thanks to these ingredients. Consequently, it removes impurities, pollution particles, and makeup without stripping away the skin's essential moisture.
The airy foam texture creates a comfortable and nice feel that makes its application pleasant. As a result, it provides the skin with a clean, fresh feeling and hydration. In addition, the formula does not sting the eyes so it can be perfectly suitable to clean the entire face. In short, this product gently cleans the skin while hydrating it, to respect even the most fragile skin. Care for the skin with this gentle yet effective skincare solution that respects and nurtures your skin's natural balance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply A-Derma Biology Hydra-Protecting Dermatological Cleansing Foam 150ml (5.07floz) to damp skin of the face and neck and massage gently with circular motions. Then, rinse thoroughly.

description:
Garnier Hyaluronic Aloe Micellar Cleansing Water 400ml (13.52 fl oz) is an all-in-one cleanser that is both effective and gentle on the skin. This micellar water is formulated with soothing Aloe vera and hydrating Hyaluronic acid to provide the skin with amazing benefits besides cleansing. On one hand, it is effective at removing makeup, dirt, and impurities from the skin by resorting to micellar technology. On the other hand, it replenishes the skin with moisture and has a replumping effect due to its hydrating formula. In short, it cleanses, replumps, and removes makeup with a single gesture!
Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested, this product is ideal for those struggling with dehydrated skin but is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Furthermore, it is suitable not only to clean the face but also for the eyes and lips. So, it becomes a great product for your daily hygiene because it's practical and cares for the skin at the same time. All in all, this micellar water effectively cleans the skin without leaving any residue and without drying the skin. Contrarily, it has a hydrating effect that leaves the skin smooth and radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Garnier Hyaluronic Aloe Micellar Cleansing Water 400ml (13.52 fl oz) to a cotton pad or reusable alternative and swipe it across the face, eyes, and lips. No need to rinse.

description:
Avène 3 in 1 Make-Up Remover Sensitive Skin is a practical product for the daily cleansing of all skin types, including sensitive skin. To begin with, it is a multi-purpose cleanser. It can not only remove impurities and makeup but is also able to soothe the skin. It has a minimalist formula that contains 88% Avène Thermal Spring Water and is suitable for both face and eyes. With unique properties, Avène Thermal Spring Water not only moisturizes the skin but also soothes, softens, and calms making this cleanser ideal to comfort sensitive skin. Whether to remove impurities or makeup, this cleanser can gently dissolve them, perfectly cleansing the skin without drying.
In addition, with a pleasant fluid texture, that does not require rinsing, and a delicate fragrance, this daily cleanser can also immediately refresh the skin, soothing and comforting. So, in essence, it not only gently removes impurities and makeup but also refreshes and soothes the skin. 95% of the users stated that the skin was relieved immediately after application and 98% were pleased with its fresh and smooth fluid texture.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

88% Avène Thermal Spring Water has a unique, rich, and stable composition, which makes it particularly suitable to soothe, soften, and calm fragile and sensitive skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Avène 3 in 1 Make-Up Remover Sensitive Skin both morning and evening. Use your fingers to gently massage the product and dissolve impurities and makeup. Remove it using a cotton pad. It does not require rinsing.

description:
Noreva Eczeane Lipid-Replenishing Cleansing Oil 1L (33.8 fl oz) is a specialized skincare solution designed to meet the needs of dry, atopic, and irritated skin. Perfect for use during your shower routine, this cleansing oil goes beyond the basics to offer a multitude of benefits aimed at enhancing skin health. One of the standout features of this product is its gentle cleansing action, which is critical for those dealing with sensitive or irritated skin. It hydrates the skin effectively while preventing loss of water, ensuring that your skin remains supple and well-moisturized throughout the day. Protection against external aggressors and free radicals is another significant benefit, courtesy of its rich blend of ingredients like Sacha Inchi Seed Oil and Vitamin E, which have strong antioxidant properties.
The formulation is enriched with Borage Seed Oil and Evening Primrose Oil that not only hydrate the skin but also soothe the skin and provide a comforting feeling to the skin. Glycerin, on the other hand, binds moisture to the skin, while also protecting the skin from external aggressors.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Noreva Eczeane Lipid-Replenishing Cleansing Oil 1L (33.8 fl oz) onto damp skin and gently massage it to help remove impurities without irritating the skin. Then thoroughly rinse to remove the product. For better results follow with the Noreva Eczeane Anti-Itch Lipid Replenishing Balm 48h.

description:
Uriage Thermal Micellar Water Normal Skin is a cleansing water that was specially developed to remove make-up and impurities from normal to dry skin types, including sensitive ones. With an extremely nourishing composition, this product is able to purify the skin without overdrying it in the process. Quite the contrary, by resorting to several hydrating agents, the Uriage Thermal Micellar Water Normal Skin not only instantly moisturizes the skin but also prevents dehydration.
Furthermore, this formula resorts to Non-Ionic Surfactants to effectively dislodge make-up and impurities from the face and eye area. At the same time, the presence of Uriage Thermal Water is responsible for soothing the skin and relieving sensations of discomfort. In other words, this cleansing water purifies the skin, all the while providing long-lasting hydration to thirsty complexions. As a result, the complexion instantly regains suppleness and softness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Uriage Thermal Micellar Water Normal Skin as part of your regular caring routine in the mornings and evenings. Apply by pouring the formula on a cotton pad. Then, gently wipe the skin of the face, eyes and neck to cleanse it. Do not rinse.

description:
Embryolisse Gentle Waterproof Make-Up Remover Milk 200ml (6.76floz) is a gentle makeup remover that promises to be a great addition to the caring routine of any skin type, especially sensitive ones. As it happens, this product has a mild composition that focuses on soothing irritation and providing optimal levels of moisture, simultaneously. Rich in hydrating active ingredients, the Lait Doux Demaquillant ensures long-lasting nourishment while preserving the skin’s flora at the same time. 
Although extremely gentle with the skin, this product is no less efficient. On the contrary, the Lait Doux Demaquillant is able to successfully remove not only makeup but also impurities and traces of pollution, leaving your skin perfectly clean. Suitable for the face, eyes and lips, this prodcut proves, moreover, to be efficient in eliminating long-lasting and waterproof formulas. 
As a last note, this is a fragrance-free composition that was dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Pour an appropriate amount of the Embryolisse Gentle Waterproof Make-Up Remover Milk 200ml (6.76floz) onto a cotton pad. Then, glide it through the skin of your face, lips and eyes with gentleness. To remove waterproof makeup, place the soaked cotton pad on top of the designated area pressing for a few seconds. Finish by wiping away.

description: LETI SR Sensitive & Red Skin ProbioClean H2O Micellar Water is an excellent cleansing product, recommended for the daily care of sensitive or red skin. In reality, the unpleasant burning or itching sensations on the face can have a great impact on the well-being of people with sensitive skin and facial redness. With this in mind, LETI created micellar water, based on ProbioClean Technology that contains Lactobacillus ferment, a probiotic ferment with moisturizing properties. Not only cleans and removes make-up from the face and eyes, but also cleans, calms, and moisturizes the skin. Moreover, it causes a soothing effect and immediate freshness, improving skin hydration. Besides, minimizes the risk of allergy, does not irritate the skin, and reduces the feeling of tightness.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Lactobacillus ferment is a probiotic that protects the skin against environmental aggressors. Additionally, it has anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory properties and an anti-acne effect.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply LETI SR Sensitive & Red Skin ProbioClean H2O Micellar Water on the skin with cotton pads until the make-up and dirt on the face and in the eyes are totally removed. No need to rinse as it leaves no greasy residues.

description: NUXE Rêve de Miel Face Cleansing and Make-Up Removing Gel 200ml (6.76fl oz) is a facial cleanser perfect for dry and sensitive skin. Furthermore, it is perfect for those who still like to cleanse their face with water even though they have dry skin. Specifically, this nourishing gel doesn't dry the skin and leaves it feeling clean and soft. Furthermore, this gel is able to remove all impurities and non-waterproof makeup. Regarding its composition, this product contains 93% of natural ingredients including honey and sunflower extracts. These, in turn, maintain the skin's pH while leaving it more hydrated and nourished than before. In the end, the skin ends up being effortlessly clean, without make-up, and even more soothed and smooth.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Rêve de Miel Face Cleansing and Make-Up Removing Gel 200ml (6.76fl oz) on wet skin and massage to lather. Rinse with water.

description: APIVITA Cleansing Gel is a mild cleanser for combination and oily skin types. Infused with a refreshing citrus fragrance, this gel cleanses the skin in-depth, removing impurities as well as excess sebum from the surface of the skin. A unique blend of regulating botanical minimizes oil production, thus leaving the complexion naturally matte and smooth. The gentle formula is also rich in antioxidant polyphenols, which keep the skin protected from free radical damage throughout the day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply APIVITA Cleansing Gel to the damp skin of the face and neck, then massage gently. Rinse thoroughly.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Filler [HA] Replumping Micellar Water provides an anti-aging action while moisturizing the skin, smoothing it and removing make-up. This micellar water cleanses the skin perfectly, leaving an immediate sensation of clean, fresh skin and without a tugging sensation. At the same time, it provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy helping to fill them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it. Thus, this luxurious water penetrates the skin leaving a non-greasy finish.  
The formula of this micellar water contains pure Hyaluronic Acid that intensely hydrate skin, smooth and replump wrinkles and the skin in general. In addition, this formula contains two types of Hyaluronic Acid. Macro muleculas provide a boost of hydration leaving the skin soft to the touch. Micro muleculas penetrate into the layers of the skin to help plump out wrinkles and lines of expession. With this, this water can not only provide you a plumped and revitalized look but also helps to cleanse your skin leaving it without makeup residue. With daily use, your skin feels softer and is replumped with moisture. Wrinkles and expression lines appear reduced and contours look smoother and fuller. It is also suitable for all skin types looking for a rejuvenated and revitalized complexion.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Hyaluronic Acid, which is a natural part of the skin connective tissue and has the capacity to retain water. This ability to not only deeply moisturize the skin but also plump it up keeps the skin hydrated while helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Filler [HA] Replumping Micellar Water morning and evening with a cotton pad as the first step of your anti-aging cleansing routine. No need to rinse.

description:
Esthederm Osmoclean Pure Cleansing Foam is a practical and refreshing option that cleanses oily or acne-prone skin delicately. In fact, this daily use foam helps to remove make-up as well as other kinds of impurities, improving the overall condition of congested tissues. Unlike other gel-textured solutions, this one already comes out of the bottle as foam. Thus, all you have to do in order to activate all its benefits is to massage the formula into the skin. When doing so, draw circular and upward motions with your fingertips.
All in all, this will help you distribute the product as evenly as possible, as you allow it to reach different areas of your face and neck. Effective from the very first application, normal to oily skin types can regain their radiance, free of excess sebum-related issues. At the same time, this also happens to refine large pores, softening blemished complexions. Finally, like the rest of Esthederm's skincare ranges, this cleansing foam is enriched with Cellular Water. This exclusive ingredient detoxifies and prevents a tugging effect, joining forces with the product's Balance System.
how_to_use: Not found

description: Bioderma Sensibio H20 AR is suitable for cleaning sensitive and intolerant skin, prone to redness and rosacea. Thanks to the unique Rosactiv patent is helps to soothe the skin and prevent redness from occurring. Suitable for cleansing the facial skin and the eye contour area, this micellar water is able to remove all traces of impurities and makeup without disrupting the skin's balance while at the same time helps to counteract the skin's tendency to redness.

how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Bioderma Sensibio H20 AR to face and eyes using a cotton pad twice daily. It's not necessary to rinse.

description: Dr. Hauschka Soothing Cleansing Milk is the perfect cleanser for people with normal skin who also use make-up. Given that it contains a high amount of nourishing botanical oils, it makes the skin comfortable even during the process of removing make-up. The botanical blend in a milky lotion respects the hydrolipidic mantle, thus ensuring that the drier skins are hydrated.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Anthyllis, jojoba and almond oils gently dissolve all impurities, including make-up.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Soothing Cleansing Milk in the morning and evening in order to gently wipe away all impurities and prepare the skin for the entire skin routine. Remove with lukewarm water, a cosmetic sponge or a dampened washcloth. In order to remove eye make-up apply the milk to a dampened cotton pad.

description:
Lancaster Comforting Cleansing Milk For Dry Skin 400ml will gently remove makeup and dirt without over-drying the skin or leaving a tight feeling behind. In fact, this rich cleanser is suitable for all types of skin but was specially developed to bring comfort to dry and delicate skin. 
Cleansing your skin is a crucial part of your daily skincare routine especially in the evenings after a long day. Not only it eliminates impurities associated with potential breakouts and premature aging, but it also preps the skin for serum and face cream application. However, a harsh cleanser can usually strip the skin of its natural moistures, providing discomfort and irritation. The Comforting Cleansing Milk by Lancaster offers simultaneously an effective and gentle cleanse. While it removes traces of makeup and impurities, it also offers nourishment. Thanks to a Botanical Mix of Moisturizing Ingredients, your skin is supple and hydrated after every application. 
Furthermore, we are talking about an easy-to-use product that does not require rinsing. To effortlessly incorporate the Lancaster Comforting Cleansing Milk into your routine, you just have to apply it with a cotton pad, delicately removing makeup and dirt. For optimum results, don’t’ forget to follow up with an appropriate toner.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients 
 
Blend of Nourishing Botanical Ingredients (Pink Flowers, Essential Rose Nectar and Rose Centifolia from the Mediterranean Basin) that delivers moisture and comfort to the skin during the cleansing ritual.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply a few drops of the Lancaster Comforting Cleansing Milk For Dry Skin 400ml on a cotton pad. Then, starting with your eye contour, gently remove makeup and impurities by softly rubbing the cotton pad on the skin. This product does not require rinsing. After, follow up by using an appropriate toner.

description:
MISSHA Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cleansing Foam has a refreshing and moisturizing formula that effectively cleanses the face without over-stripping the skin. The fine and rich foam produced is gentle on the skin and allows for a luxurious and pleasant experience. Moreover, the Baobab extract and Deep Seawater improve skin hydration by helping the skin to retain moisture. Lastly, Botanical Callus extract helps to control blemishes and dark spots thus evening out skin tone and luminosity. Overall, this cleanser is the perfect choice for those with normal to oily skin types as it will keep the skin moisturized and comfortable after cleansing. Additionally, thanks to its repairing benefits, this cleanser is particularly beneficial for those with sensitive and acne-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take an appropriate amount of MISSHA Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Cleansing Foam with wet hands and work it into a lather. Then massage the product over wet skin and rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
