description:
Ziaja Cleansing Foam Face Wash Dry Skin 150ml (5.2 fl oz) is a gentle yet effective cleanser designed for daily use on dry skin types. This foam contains 98% ingredients of natural origin and cleanses the skin thoroughly while also removing makeup. Additionally, it is suitable for individuals with sensitive eyes, including contact lens wearers. Its formula is enriched with betaine, lactic acid, sodium PCA, niacinamide, and panthenol. These ingredients ensure that the skin is not only clean but also hydrated, maintaining its natural moisture balance and a healthy skin barrier.
The foam’s delicate fragrance enhances the cleansing experience, making it a pleasant part of your daily skincare routine. All in all, this is a good option for those seeking a gentle yet effective cleanser that can also handle makeup removal. It leaves the skin feeling refreshed, soft, and clean without any tightness or dryness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Cleansing Foam Face Wash Dry Skin 150ml (5.2 fl oz) onto damp skin of the face. Then, gently massage the skin. Finally, thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water.

description:
Ziaja Goat's Milk Milky Face Wash 200ml (7.0 fl oz) is a gentle face wash for daily use. It delicately removes impurities from the skin while also providing a mild solution for eye makeup removal, being suitable for contact lens wearers and those with false eyelashes. This product's formula is based on delicate cleansing agents that do not foam and effectively cleanse the skin without altering its protective barrier. It also contains goat milk, an ingredient used for centuries that helps soothe, hydrate, and soften the skin. Additionally, the face wash contains hyaluronic acid, olive oil, and shea butter derivatives. So, these ingredients work together to provide extra softening and hydration, leaving the skin feeling clean and soft.
Lastly, this product can be used for cleansing with or without water. This versatility makes it convenient for various skin care routines and preferences. In essence, this face wash helps keep the skin soft, smooth, and protected against dryness and irritation.
how_to_use:
How to use
You can use Ziaja Goat's Milk Milky Face Wash 200ml (7.0 fl oz) with or without water. To use with water, apply it to wet skin and gently massage. Then, rinse with lukewarm water. To use without water, dispense an appropriate amount of product onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, gently wipe it across the skin in circular motions and do not rinse.

description:
Banila Co Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is a cleansing balm specially formulated to meet the needs of those who need exfoliation and decongestion. To begin with, this product is a makeup remover that effortlessly dissolves even the most stubborn, waterproof makeup and the entirety of skin impurities in a singular sweep. But, at the same time, it also combats breakouts, battles clogged pores, and ensures a blemish-free complexion. This is due to the incorporation of a Tri-Peel Acid Blend™ comprising AHA, BHA, and LHA, to remove excess dead skin cells, thus ensuring exfoliation and pore-cleansing. As a result, it leaves the complexion smooth and free from congestion. And the Zero Balance Technology™ ensures this blam profoundly cleans without compromising the skin's inherent moisture balance.
Another key point of this product and one of the most distinguishing features is its transformation from a sherbet-like consistency to an oil upon contact with the skin. In essence, this hypoallergenic cleansing balm offers effective both makeup removal and an unparalleled deep cleanse, consequently ensuring clean, clear, and healthy skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use the spatula to scoop Banila Co Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying 100ml (3.38 fl oz). Apply to dry skin and gently massage in circular motions. Then, add water to emulsify and massage again. Lastly, rinse well with lukewarm water or wipe off.

description:
Banila Co Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing 100ml (3.38 fl oz) delivers clean skin while combating the first signs of aging. For that purpose, this product is infused with a powerhouse of ingredients that are known to fight against free radicals. In particular, the formula incorporates resveratrol, grape seed extract, and olive oil. Together, they synergize to offer antioxidant properties that consequently help protect the skin from environmental stressors and combat the first signs of aging. As a result, this balm offers a refreshed, brighter skin appearance post-cleanse. Equally important, the Zero Balance Technology™ ensures this blam profoundly cleans without compromising the skin's inherent moisture balance.
Another key point of this product and one of the most distinguishing features is its transformation from a sherbet-like consistency to an oil upon contact with the skin. With the same makeup melting capabilities as the original balm, it efficiently removes even the most stubborn waterproof makeup and the various impurities your skin accumulates throughout the day. In essence, this cleansing balm promises not just clean skin, but also a brighter, healthier complexion that's protected and revitalized.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use the spatula to scoop Banila Co Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing 100ml (3.38 fl oz). Apply to dry skin and gently massage in circular motions. Then, add water to emulsify and massage again. Lastly, rinse well with lukewarm water or wipe off.

description:
Corine de Farme Bio Purifying Face Cleansing Gel With Organic Verbena 150ml (5.07floz) is a facial cleansing gel that offers a gentle yet effective cleansing experience. It helps to purify the skin, eliminating impurities and excess sebum without compromising the skin's natural hydration. Its formula boasts 99% ingredients of natural origin, including 10% sourced from organic farming. Additionally, it is enriched with organic verbena and aloe vera. So, verbena provides a refreshing effect, working in harmony with aloe vera, known for its hydrating and soothing benefits. Therefore, this combination delivers soothing and hydrating properties, leaving the skin feeling perfectly clean, fresh, and comfortable. 
Moreover, this gel is suitable for sensitive skin. A study of its effects, through an auto-evaluation by 20 volunteers over three weeks of use, found that: 100% of users found the product pleasant to use, 95% agreed that it gently cleanses the skin, and 90% agreed that it doesn't leave a feeling of tightness after use. All in all, this product delivers a thorough but gentle cleanse, leaving the skin refreshed, purified, and balanced. It's a great option for the skin's daily cleansing routine.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Aloe Vera is rich in vitamins, minerals, and polyphenols. It soothes, hydrates, and supports skin repair, also having antioxidant properties.
Verbena has antioxidant and also soothing effects.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Corine de Farme Bio Purifying Face Cleansing Gel With Organic Verbena 150ml (5.07floz) onto wet skin of the face. Then, gently massage the skin to lather the product. Finally, thoroughly rinse with water.

description:
Corine de Farme 3-In-1 Refreshing Micellar Gel With Cornflower Extract 500ml (16.90floz) is a skincare solution for daily skin cleansing. It cleanses and removes makeup, hydrates the skin, and provides a refreshing sensation. With a formula containing 95% ingredients of natural origin, this micellar gel incorporates blue cornflower, known for its soothing and refreshing properties, which contribute to leaving the skin feeling fresh, calm, and gently toned. 
This micellar gel caters to all skin types, including sensitive skin, so that everyone can enjoy the benefits of a thorough yet gentle cleanse. Its triple-action formula makes it a great option for the skincare routine. First, it acts as a cleanser and makeup remover, dissolving and lifting away impurities and makeup residue from the skin's surface. So, this ensures that the skin is left clean and clear, ready for the next steps in the skincare regimen. Then, there's the hydrating effect, helping to maintain the skin’s delicate moisture balance. Lastly, the refreshing quality of the gel is particularly enjoyable. The inclusion of blue cornflower in the formula provides a refreshing and calming effect on the skin, making the cleansing process not just effective but also a moment of relaxation. All in all, this product delivers a gentle yet effective cleanse that hydrates and refreshes the skin in one easy step.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Cornflower Flower Water comes from the blue cornflower flowers. This ingredient contains polysaccharides with soothing effects, helping to reduce irritation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Corine de Farme 3-In-1 Refreshing Micellar Gel With Cornflower Extract 500ml (16.90floz) onto wet skin of the face. Then, gently massage the skin to lather the product. Finally, thoroughly rinse with water.

description:
SunewMed+ Vitamin C Perfect Whitening Cleansing Foam 200ml (6.76 fl oz) is a facial cleansing foam that combines cleansing and care in one single product. Designed to effectively remove daily impurities, cosmetic residues, and even waterproof makeup from the skin, this cleansing foam does so without disturbing the skin's protective barrier. Moreover, it helps maintain revitalized, bright, and luminous skin. So, this product's formula is enriched with a Vitamin C derivative, known for its antioxidant benefits, which support radiant and vibrant skin. In other words, this key ingredient helps to fight against free radicals, promoting a healthier and more luminous complexion. Additionally, it also includes neroli essential oil, with antioxidant and antimicrobial properties.
This product boasts a rich foam texture that transforms the cleansing ritual into a pleasant experience. In fact, this lather gently envelops the skin, ensuring a thorough cleanse that lifts away impurities and makeup and is a delight to use both morning and night. Suitable for all skin types, this cleansing foam leaves the skin smooth, perfectly clean, and refreshed. It is a great option for the skincare routine of anyone looking to maintain clean, happy, and radiant skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Massage two or three pumps of SunewMed+ Vitamin C Perfect Whitening Cleansing Foam 200ml (6.76 fl oz) onto damp skin of the face, using circular motions. Then, thoroughly rinse using lukewarm water.

description:
Chasin' Rabbits Mindful Bubble Cleanse 200ml (6.76 fl oz) is a gentle foaming cleanser designed to provide a deep and thorough cleanse. Its unique formula is enriched with activated charcoal, known for its ability to effectively absorb excess sebum and impurities. Moreover, this product creates microbubbles. As such, this cleanser ensures a comprehensive cleaning process, deeply cleaning the skin and helping to unclog pores. The inclusion of bamboo water in the formula adds another dimension to this product. With antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties, bamboo water assists in soothing and healing the skin, being particularly helpful in acne and blemishes, thanks to its ability to reduce redness and irritation. With this in mind, this cleanser is especially beneficial for those with oily or acne-prone skin, although it is suitable for all skin types.
One of the standout features of this product is its multipurpose nature. While primarily formulated for facial use, it's also suitable for cleansing the scalp, body, and hands. This adaptability ensures that the product can be a central part of a comprehensive skincare and hygiene routine. With a fresh scent, it offers a sensorial experience while providing a balanced and deep cleanse.
how_to_use:
How to use
Shake well before use. Apply Chasin' Rabbits Mindful Bubble Cleanse 200ml (6.76 fl oz) to wet hands and massage to lather. Then, apply it to the face or body and massage to clean. Rinse thoroughly.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Topicrem AC Purifying Micellar Water 400ml (13.5 fl oz) is a gentle cleansing product that not only removes daily impurities but also eliminates makeup. Specifically, this product suits the needs of combination to oily skin that struggles with sensitivity, including acne-prone skin. In fact, after each application, this micellar water purifies and mattifies the skin, leaving a refreshing feeling. The formula, containing 99% ingredients of natural origin, features Zinc Gluconate that helps reduce excess sebum, whereas Glycerin balances skin hydration. Furthermore, the formula is soap-free and suitable for sensitive skin and eyes. As it happens, this product can be used to remove makeup from the eyes. That said, it is effective in removing even waterproof makeup! In conclusion, this micellar water cleanses and removes all types of makeup while reducing excess sebum of combination to oily skin, yet without drying out the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Topicrem AC Purifying Micellar Water 400ml (13.5 fl oz) on a cotton pad or reusable alternative and gently swipe it on the face, and neck. For the eyes, hold the cotton pad for a few seconds on closed eyes. No need to rinse.

description:
ISDIN Teen Skin Acniben 3 On The Go Imperfections Minimizer Wipes  x30 was specifically designed to manage localized blemishes whenever you need to. These are the perfect product for an on-the-go action to fight occasional blemishes. In this way, the wipes contain a formula with ingredients that provide a triple action. On one hand, Salicylic acid exfoliates the skin and helps to unclog the pores. On the other hand, Aloe vera helps to reduce redness and irritation associated with blemishes. As a result, these wipes unclog pores, reduce excess sebum and purify the skin.
That is to say, these wipes help to eliminate blemishes and blackheads. Furthermore, its single-use format makes it easy and practical to use. All in all, these drying wipes are the perfect solution to minimize acne imperfections when you're not home!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply ISDIN Teen Skin Acniben 3 On The Go Imperfections Minimizer Wipes  x30 to the affected area using gentle, circular motions, whenever and wherever needed throughout the day. For single use only.

description:
Dermalogica Daily Microfoliant Exfoliator 74g (2.6 oz) is a powder exfoliant that helps you achieve smooth and radiant skin. The founder Jane Wurwand was inspired by her time at a Japanese hot spring to develop this product. Conversely, the packaging takes inspiration from a parmesan cheese shaker! This powder exfoliant is activated when in contact with water, releasing papain, salicylic acid, and rice enzymes. Moreover, phytic acid present in rice bran also has exfoliating properties. These ingredients will act synergically with the physical mechanism of the powder to exfoliate thus removing dead skin cells. 
In addition, white tea and licorice help balance uneven skin tone while allantoin and colloidal oatmeal calm and soothe the skin. This exfoliant contains an ultra-fine powder so it is gentle and suitable for daily use, helping to balance pigmentation and improve skin texture. All in all, this product combines all three types of exfoliation - chemical, physical and enzymatic - revealing smoother and brighter skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply half a teaspoon of Dermalogica Daily Microfoliant Exfoliator 74g (2.6 oz) into wet hands. Then rub your hands together to create a creamy paste. Massage gently on the face with circular motions, avoiding the eye area. Do this for one minute and finally, rinse thoroughly.

description:
Frudia Citrus Brightening Micro Cleansing Foam 145ml (4.9 fl oz) is a deep brightening cleansing foam conceptualized for dull and sensitive skin. Besides returning the glow to your skin by reducing dark spots, it cleans the skin and removes impurities. Due to a vitamin-rich formula with 46% of Jeju Tangerine Peel Extract, this mask brightens up dark spots such as blemishes and freckles and revives dull skin while evening the tone. Its thin micro bubbles make it easy to remove any dust or makeup residues from the skin. On top of that, it also has a Dust Zero Complex, rich in ingredients responsible for removing impurities from the skin, which evens the texture of the skin providing it with a soft and clean feel. It is a great product to use daily prior to applying makeup or carrying on with your skincare routine. Your skin will be glowing after a simple cleansing!
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Citrus Brightening Micro Cleansing Foam 145ml (4.9 fl oz) one to two pumps to previously cleansed hands. Then, gently massage it to a wet face and neck. Finally, wash your face with warm water and dry it with a soft and clean towel.

description:
Martiderm Essentials Biphasic Eye Make-Up Remover 125ml is a makeup remover formulated specifically for the eye area. This biphasic makeup remover comprises a lipophilic phase and an aqueous one. As a result, this product gently yet effectively removes any impurity or makeup, including waterproof makeup without leaving a greasy finish. At the same time, it hydrates the skin thanks to Edelweiss extract and Prebiotics. Furthermore, Bisabolol included in the formula helps to soothe the skin. As a result, this formula is very gentle on the eye area and it does not burn, sting, or irritate this delicate area.
Furthermore, it is respectful with the eyelashes with 87% of users saying it reduces lash loss. Also important to note, 89% of contact lens wearers and 88% of users with sensitive eyes recommend this makeup remover.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, shake well to mix the two phases. Apply Martiderm Essentials Biphasic Eye Make-Up Remover 125ml on a cotton pad and apply it to the area to be cleaned. Gently press and swipe the cotton pad. Do not rinse.

description: Topicrem Gentle Cleansing Gel is a gentle face and body cleanser that ensures makeup removal and skin hydration without sensitizing the skin barrier. It features 5% glycerin, to keep the skin hydrated even after rinsing off the product. Moreover, the non-stripping surfactants ensure a gentle and comfortable cleansing experience, compatible with even the most sensitive skin types - a tolerance that is highlighted by the minimalist formula with only 11 ingredients. As a result, the user achieves a perfect balance of clean skin and soft texture, including on particularly critical areas like around the eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Topicrem Gentle Cleansing Gel over damp skin and gently massage until the product starts to lather. Rinse off the foam with lukewarm water and pat dry with a towel avoiding vigorous friction. Can be used on the face and body.

description: Topicrem AC Purifying Cleansing Gel is a purifying facial cleanser that eliminates impurities as well as excess sebum on sensitive oily skin. Suitable for adults as well as for teenagers, this fragrant gel delivers a subtle floral-fruity scent with each application. Topicrem features exclusively highly pure actives in all formulations. This gel counts on a 97% pure zinc gluconate to regulate excess sebum. In addition, 98.5% pure allantoin soothes, softens and protects the skin. Tested under dermatological and ophthalmological control, this formula allows a thorough cleanse without drying the skin. Use it daily for clear, fresh and purified skin with less shine and sebum.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Topicrem AC Purifying Cleansing Gel directly onto the wet face, as the first step of both morning and evening skincare routine. Then, follow with your favorite serum, moisturizer of SPF. In case of contact with the eyes, rinse thoroughly.

description: Nivea Rose Care Micellar Water with Bio Rose Water & Oil is as delicate as ever and does not require rubbing or rinsing. Thus, it does not leave residue, removing dirt as well as sebum effortlessly, having a wonderful cleansing effect on your eyes and lips. Formulated without fragrance, the formula is gentle yet effective, guarding your lashes against harsh rubbing. In fact, this even casts away waterproof mascara, providing a quick fix regardless of where you are. A small portion on a cotton pad is enough to reveal a clean face with healthy as well as extra soft skin. Occupying little space in your everyday bag, this option relies heavily on the magnet-like effects of Micellar Technology to erase impurities. Finally, infused with Organic Rose Flower Water, it produces quick and remarkable results on all skin types!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Nivea Rose Care Micellar Water with Bio Rose Water & Oil onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, place gently over your eyes and lips for a few seconds and hold. Wipe away the rest of your make-up with the pad until your face is completely clean.

description: NUXE Very Rose Creamy Make-up Remover Milk has a particular milk in oil texture that gently, but effectively, cleanses the skin. Formulated with 95% of natural origin ingredients it perfectly removes accumulated impurities and also make-up. Its unique combination of botanical origin ingredients, such as Rose Floral Water and the Skin-Respect Complex, provides this product the ability to take care of your skin while cleansing. These ingredients are capable of retaining water and strengthen the skin barrier. This not only helps prevent dryness but also shields the skin from environmental sources of irritation preserving its natural balance. Along with the ability to hydrate and comfort the skin, its texture and fragrance also provides you a pleasant sensorial experience. Due to a subtle, fresh, and delicate rose scent, it enhances your senses and leaves your skin feeling fresh, soft, and comforted.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Very Rose Creamy Make-up Remover Milk with a gentle massage using your fingertips or a cotton pad. Thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water.

description:
Rilastil Aqua Face Cleanser is a gentle cleansing solution that can purify the skin by removing all impurities and makeup residue but without stripping it from its natural moisture levels. The Rilastil Aqua Face Cleanser is actually very nourishing, as well, promoting skin hydration thanks to its rich composition.
Moreover, this composition is part of the Rilastil’s Aqua range, a set of products that has as its main purpose an optimal hydration of the skin. In fact, this line focuses on offering intense moisture, leaving the skin fresh, plumped and smooth. It does so through the power of smart formulas with Hyaluronic Acid with both high and low molecular weight. While the Hyaluronic Acid with high molecular weight (Sodium Hyaluronate) moisturizes the first skin layer, the one with low molecular weight (Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid) is able to deeply penetrate the skin providing moisture to the deep layers.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Introduce the Rilastil Aqua Face Cleanser to your morning and nighttime routine as your selected cleanser. Apply it to wet skin, gently massaging. Then, rinse thoroughly. Complement its use with other products from the same range for optimal results.

description: Esthederm Osmoclean Osmopure Face and Eyes Cleansing Water is a 3-in-1 product that combines the effectiveness of three products. In this case, it combines a skin cleanser with the properties of a micellar water and the benefits of a toning lotion. Specifically, this gentle cleansing product has the effectiveness of a cleansing milk, but with the freshness of a toner to provide both of the best products in only one swipe. Suitable for all skin types, this product is ideal for people who are always busy and don't have much time or for trips in which you don't want to travel with many products. Finally, this product is dermatologically tested and does not have harsh ingredients for the most sensitive skins, making it suitable for everyone.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Osmoclean Osmopure Face and Eyes Cleansing Water to a cotton pad and gently wipe all impurities and traces of make-up. Suitable for face and eye contour area. Do not rinse after using.

description: Comodynes Make-Up Remover Micellar Solution Normal Skin is an innovative make-up remover suitable for normal skin, including sensitive. Combining the properties of a cleanser and a moisturizer in a single product, this extra-soft towelette is moistened with a micellar solution with high skin tolerance, which eliminates impurities and make-up, leaving the skin clean, fresh, and renewed.
how_to_use:
How to use
Massage Comodynes Make-Up Remover Micellar Solution Normal Skin onto face and eyes for 1 minute to remove impurities and make-up. No need to rinse afterwards.

description: La Roche-Posay Micellar Water Ultra Reactive Skin is a cleansing micellar water which removes 98% of make-up with the first cotton pad including eye and lips. The ultra comfortable texture removes all impurities from the skin and has an anti-redness and anti-dryness action in order to make the most sensitive skins ultra comfortable.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Roche-Posay Micellar Water Ultra Reactive Skin onto a cotton pad and cleanse the skin until all impurities are removed. No need to rinse after.

description:
Lierac The Micellar Water gently yet effectively cleans the skin without requiring rinsing. In fact, this product removes both makeup and impurities with a single gesture. Meanwhile, this product has a vegan and natural formula with 96% ingredients of natural origin. Furthermore, it is infused with a Marine Prebiotic Complex which helps to preserve the skin microbiome while cleaning the skin. For this purpose, this complex comprises three main ingredients that provide essential nutrition to the skin microbiota and therefore, contribute to maintaining a balanced microbiome.
Thanks to its gentle formula, this product is suitable for both the face and eyes and for all skin types, even sensitive ones. Moreover, it contains a fresh and delicately scented texture that leaves the skin perfectly cleansed, fresh, and radiant. In other words, this micellar water not only removes makeup and cleanses the skin but also moisturizes it lending it softness.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Marine Prebiotic Complex comprises three active ingredients namely sea water, green and brown algae, and sugar. Firstly, sea water is rich in minerals and trace minerals which are important to the skin microbiome. Secondly, green and brown algae are sources of sugars and amino acids that provide nutrients to the bacteria on the skin. And lastly, sugar maintains a good environment for bacteria. All in all, this complex provides essential nutrients adapted to the needs of skin microbiota to keep a balanced microbiome.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac The Micellar Water with a cotton pad or reusable alternative to the face and eyes. Swipe gently to remove impurities and makeup. Do not rinse. Use both in the morning and evening.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

1x Sensilis Purify Essential Cleanser 400ml
1x Sensilis Purify Essential Cleanser 100ml

Sensilis Purify Essential Cleanser is a purifying facial cleanser that eliminates excess sebum as well as impurities from the skin surface. As it cleanses the skin with a refreshing texture, it eliminates excess oil and works to minimize the appearance of enlarged pores. This product replaces the Sensilis Ritual Care Purifying Cleansing Gel with a new formula and packaging.
Ideal for combination to oily skin types, this cleanser is suitable both for morning and evening cleansing. Combining flax extract together with zinc, the gel eliminates impurities and helps to reduce the appearance of pores. Providing a thorough and gentle cleanse, this gel is essential as the base of any skincare routine to tackle excess oiliness.

description:
Clarins One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser 125ml (4.22floz) is a revolutionary 3-in-1 formula that effortlessly combines makeup removal, cleansing, and exfoliation into a single action. To begin with, the cleanser features plant-based microbeads that gently exfoliate the skin, offering a gentle peeling effect that ensures soft, cleansed skin upon rinsing. The gel texture transforms into a fine, creamy foam, providing a makeup-free, deeply cleansed, and exfoliated skin. This product also stands out for its enriching herbal extracts. On one hand, the [Gentle Complex] with organic yellow gentian and lemon balm extracts, is specially selected for its soothing and softening benefits. At the same time, key ingredients like organic kiwi extract energize the skin, restoring its radiance, while moringa extract is known for its ability to help eliminate pollution particles.
Therefore, this cleanser works to purify the skin and imbue it with a luminous glow while delivering soothing and softening benefits. It maintains the skin balance, catering to all skin types and being particularly advantageous for those who want a multifunctional product. In summary, this cleanser cleanses, exfoliates, and revitalizes the skin, ensuring a radiant, soft, and refreshed complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser 125ml (4.22floz) to damp skin with circular movements. Then, rinse well with water.

how_to_use: Not found

how_to_use: Not found

description:
Holika Holika Smooth Egg Skin Peeling Gel provides an intensive exfoliating effect, peeling congested skin and clearing acne, black or whiteheads. Ideal for relieving one's complexion, this cleanses oily to combination skin, smoothing out blemishes. In fact, a rather effective formula brightens your complexion, mattifying it and regulating sebum production while also narrowing enlarged pores. All in all, this is capable of balancing out skin tone, refreshing deeply as well as preserving elasticity.
Meanwhile, this clears the epidermis without stripping its moisture barrier or causing dehydration. Furthermore, it relies on a blend of nourishing extracts like Blueberry, Sugarcane, or Orange. However, Egg Yolk Extract remains the most important one due to its high lipolytic activity. It not only stimulates skin glands and enzymes but also soothes one's overall complexion, reducing wrinkles. In turn, this peeling gel ends up boosting firmness, making vulnerable skin tissues extra resilient.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable portion of Holika Holika Smooth Egg Skin Peeling Gel onto dry skin, making sure to avoid the sensitive eye and mouth sections. Massage the product all over your face as evenly and delicately as possible for approximately one minute. Then, rinse abundantly with lukewarm water. Finally, remember to use this peeling solution only once a week. Alternatively, check out the Holika Holika Smooth Egg Skin Cleansing Foam and see if this also appeals to you.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Bright Reveal Spot Fading Serum-In-Cleanser 150ml (5.07 fl oz) is particularly designed to address the needs of those seeking a brighter, more even complexion. This innovative cleanser combines the potent benefits of niacinamide and salicylic acid, offering a gentle yet effective solution to combat skin imperfections, including acne and post-acne marks while still being suitable for sensitive skin. The inclusion of niacinamide, known for its ability to reduce the appearance of dark spots, works synergistically with salicylic acid, a gentle exfoliant that targets imperfections. Together, these active ingredients provide a dual approach: brightening the complexion while purifying the skin of blemishes and excess sebum.
 Each application brings a burst of freshness, alongside results. The formulation is clinically proven to deliver remarkable results. This cleanser reduced pimples by 51%, post-acne marks by 57%, and excess oiliness by 41%. In summary, this serum-in-cleanser not only promises to deliver visible results in reducing pimples, marks, and oiliness but also ensures a luminous and refreshed skin appearance with every use.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Bright Reveal Spot Fading Serum-In-Cleanser 150ml (5.07 fl oz) to a wet face, gently massage into the skin, then rinse thoroughly.

description:
Frezyderm Ac-Norm Active Cleanser 200ml (6.76floz) is a specially formulated cleanser that addresses the unique needs of acne-prone skin. This product stands out in its ability to effectively remove excess oil, daily dirt, and makeup, while simultaneously providing targeted acne treatment. It is suitable for all types of acne-prone skin, catering to a range of acne severity from mild to severe. Also, its versatility makes it an excellent choice for those undergoing acne treatment or looking for a reliable cleanser to maintain their skin's health post-medical sessions for acne. The key ingredients in the formula are both AHA and BHA. This combination offers exfoliating and keratolytic properties while also providing antimicrobial and sebum-regulating benefits. This action contributes to a clearer, more balanced complexion. In addition to these ingredients, the cleanser contains Moringa peptides with offer antioxidant protection. 
Last but not least, the presence of Deepsan in the formula plays a significant role in reducing skin discomfort and irritation. All in all, this liquid cleanser is effective in acne management but also gentle and non-irritating. In summary, it cleanses, treats, and soothes the skin, catering to the needs of those with acne-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Frezyderm Ac-Norm Active Cleanser 200ml (6.76floz) twice a day on the face, back and chest. Apply to wet skin, massage to lather, and then, rinse with water.

description:
Sioris Day by Day Cleansing Gel relies on a 100% natural formula to cast away all sorts of daily impurities, balancing the skin's pH levels. In fact, Bishop's Weed joins forces with Citrus Peel Extract to brighten and moisturize deeply, leaving your complexion particularly energized. In order to continue the refreshing exfoliating process, Black Willow Bark Extract eliminates dead skin cells without endangering the defensive barrier against free radicals or other pollutants.
All in all, a blend of seasonal Korean ingredients confers a new kind of effectiveness to this weightless cleansing gel. Specially designed to purify congested areas, regulating excess sebum as well as refining enlarged pores, this also works towards reducing irritation. Vegan as well as enriched with 5% Organic Aloe Vera Juice, use this well-rounded skincare essential on a daily basis, within six months of opening it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Start by mixing theSioris Day by Day Cleansing Gel with a small portion of water so the formula can turn into a fine foam. Then, perform a delicate massage, drawing upward or circular motions with your fingertips. Remember to avoid the sensitive eye and lips areas when doing so. Finally, rinse abundantly with room temperature water. Don't forget to explore the rest of Sioris' skincare options to see if these also appeal to you.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Clarins Gentle Eye Make-Up Remover 125ml (4.2 fl oz) is specifically designed for sensitive eyes, effectively and gently removing makeup while soothing this sensitive area. This makeup remover stands out for its inclusion of organic golden gentian extract and organic cornflower extract, both key to calming the delicate skin around the eyes. The combination of these botanical extracts contributes to the overall effectiveness of this product in providing a gentle yet efficient cleansing experience. With the particular needs of the fragile skin of the eye contour area in mind, this cleanser is gentle enough for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
Equally important, it is particularly adept at removing light, natural makeup. Nonetheless, it also serves as a cleansing option for those who want a gentle cleansing experience while caring for the lashes. This is because this product also contains panthenol, known for its lash-protecting properties that beautify and fortify the lashes. As a result, the formulation of this product ensures that it not only removes makeup and impurities with gentleness but also provides a soothing and softening effect on the skin around the eyes. Its texture is both fresh and gentle with a delicate floral scent, making it a comforting addition to any skincare routine. In summary, this makeup remover cleanses effectively and cares for the sensitive eye area.
how_to_use:
How to use
Soak a cotton pad or reusable alternative with Clarins Gentle Eye Make-Up Remover 125ml (4.2 fl oz) and place it over closed eyes. Gently tap it against the eyelids for 10 seconds and then swipe it over.

description:
Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin 3-In-1 Cleansing Balm 50ml (1.69 fl oz) stands out as a multifunctional product, rich in nourishing ingredients. To begin with, this cleansing balm is versatile in its application, offering three distinct ways to enhance your skincare routine. In particular, it can be used as a nourishing first cleanse, a gentle second cleanse, or an effective makeup remover. That said, the balm's formulation gently removes excess sebum, dirt, and excessive oils. Moreover, it is adept at melting away all makeup residue, including waterproof mascara, ensuring that the skin is left smooth and clean. This feature is particularly beneficial for those who wear makeup regularly and are looking for an efficient way to remove it while caring for their skin.
Regarding its composition, it features the nurturing properties of papaya seed oil, olive oil, and jojoba oil. In this way, this balm helps keep the skin nourished and hydrated. Additionally, the antioxidant properties of the ingredients contribute to protecting and caring for the skin. In summary, this cleansing balm offers a comprehensive skincare solution that cleanses and nourishes the skin, being an ideal addition to your cleansing step.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin 3-In-1 Cleansing Balm 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the skin and massage. Add some water to emulsify and then rinse thoroughly.

description:
Garnier Pure Active Moisturizing Cleansing Gel 250ml (8.45 fl oz) has a unique formula that offers a thorough cleansing experience while maintaining the skin's natural moisture balance. With this in mind, this cleansing gel features a blend of hyaluronic acid, ceramide, and clay. While the clay has absorbing properties, hyaluronic acid and ceramide work to maintain the skin's moisture levels. That said, the formula is crafted to effectively remove impurities, excess oil, and makeup while simultaneously protecting the skin's barrier. Therefore, this cleansing gel is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive ones. Upon application, the skin is left clean, calm, and hydrated. The product's effectiveness extends beyond immediate results, with continuous use over two weeks revealing softer skin texture. In addition, it also provides a renewed and more radiant appearance of the skin, alongside a significant reduction in the visibility of pores.
As a last note, the formula is vegan and free of sulfates and fragrance. In summary, this gel offers an effective cleanse without stripping the skin of its essential moisture. On the contrary, it hydrates the skin. As such, it promotes a cleaner, smoother, and supple complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Garnier Pure Active Moisturizing Cleansing Gel 250ml (8.45 fl oz) to damp skin and massage to lather. Then, rinse thoroughly.

description:
Talika Lash Conditioning Cleanser 100ml (3.3 fl oz) is a gentle eye makeup remover that effectively removes all traces of makeup from the delicate eye area while also caring for the lashes. So, this non-greasy cleanser boasts a formula with 93% natural ingredients. Gentle cleansing agents effortlessly eliminate every trace of makeup in the eye area, from mascara to concealer, and even waterproof makeup. However, what sets this product apart is that it not just removes makeup. It also soothes and protects the skin, while helping to strengthen and enhance the appearance of the lashes. So, thanks to cornflower water, silk proteins, and Coleus forskohlii, the delicate eye area is soothed from irritation while the lashes receive the care they need to become strong and healthy-looking. 
So, say goodbye to the struggle of removing waterproof makeup! With this eye makeup remover, you'll effortlessly remove even the boldest eye looks while being sure you're protecting your delicate eye area. Even more, this single gesture also helps you maintain strong, beautiful lashes. In other words, this product helps you achieve perfectly cleansed, soothed skin, with protected and strong lashes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense Talika Lash Conditioning Cleanser 100ml (3.3 fl oz) onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, wipe the pad across closed eyelids, using downward movements. No rinsing is necessary.

description:
Ziaja Acai Berry Antioxidation Micellar Cleansing Face Scrub Gel 200ml (7.0 fl oz) is a facial care product that combines the benefits of a cleanser with the smoothing effects of an exfoliator. Designed for daily use, this product gently cleanses the skin while delicately exfoliating, removing dead skin cells and revealing a smoother and more radiant complexion. The formula is vegan and contains 98% of ingredients derived from natural sources. The inclusion of açaí berry extract infuses the gel with powerful antioxidants, which help protect the skin from environmental stressors and pollution, promoting the skin's radiance and resistance to visible signs of aging. Additionally, the formula is enriched with a vitamin C derivative and panthenol, known for its hydrating and soothing properties. 
Moreover, the gentle nature of the exfoliating particles ensures that the skin is exfoliated without harshness, making this product ideal for maintaining a smooth and refined skin texture. In essence, this product offers benefits such as cleansing, exfoliating, and antioxidant protection. It's a great addition to the skincare routine of those aiming to prevent the first signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of Ziaja Acai Berry Antioxidation Micellar Cleansing Face Scrub Gel 200ml (7.0 fl oz) onto the palms. Then, apply it onto wet skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Massage for a few moments and finally thoroughly rinse.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Corine de Farme Bio 3-In-1 Micellar Water With Organic Verbena 400ml (13.52floz) is a product that offers a 3-in-1 effect: it not only cleanses impurities and makeup effectively but also soothes and hydrates the skin. In other words, this micellar water excels in removing impurities and makeup from the skin's surface, thanks to the micelles in the water that lift away dirt, oil, and makeup from the skin, for a cleansing process that is gentle yet thorough. Meanwhile, it also helps soothe and moisturize the superficial layers of the epidermis, thereby providing comfort to the skin.
This product's formula contains 99% ingredients of natural origin, including 10% from organic farming. Additionally, it is enriched with organic verbena extract, known for its antioxidant and calming properties. It is suitable for sensitive skin, and provides a convenient and effective solution for daily facial cleansing and makeup removal, leaving the skin feeling clean, soft, and refreshed. All in all, this micellar water delivers comprehensive cleansing and care, making it a great option for the daily beauty regimen.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Aloe Vera is rich in vitamins, minerals, and polyphenols. It soothes, hydrates, and supports skin repair, also having antioxidant properties.
Verbena has antioxidant and soothing effects.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of Corine de Farme Bio 3-In-1 Micellar Water With Organic Verbena 400ml (13.52floz) onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, gently wipe it across the skin of the face, including the eyelids. Finally, do not rinse. As a last note, do not apply to irritated or wounded skin.

description:
Corine de Farme Micellar Water With Peony Extract 500ml (16.9floz) is a skincare solution that combines three essential benefits in a single step. In fact, it effectively cleanses the skin and removes makeup, hydrates, and soothes the skin. This product is suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin, therefore making it a good option for anyone looking to enhance their skincare routine. Formulated with 97% ingredients of natural origin, it is enriched with peony extract, which is a flower renowned for its bright and exuberant colors and petals. So, this extract delivers antioxidant properties and calming effects, so that the skin feels comforted after each use.
Providing a thorough cleanse while maintaining the skin's moisture, this micellar water is ideal for daily use, allowing for the removal of makeup and daily impurities with ease. So, it ensures that all users can enjoy the benefits of a cleansed, hydrated, and soothed complexion. By combining the cleansing power of micellar technology with the natural benefits of peony extract, this product stands as a testament to Corine de Farme's dedication to gentle, effective, and accessible skincare.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Peony Extract has antioxidant, toning, and soothing benefits.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of Corine de Farme Micellar Water With Peony Extract 500ml (16.9floz) onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, gently wipe it across the skin of the face, including the eyelids. Do not use it on irritated or wounded skin. As a last note, this product's appearance may change over time. However, this does not interfere with its efficacy.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Allegro Natura Organic Cleansing Milk 125ml (4.23 fl oz) is a gentle skin cleanser and makeup remover. It also helps to soothe and hydrate the skin, leaving it feeling clean, calm, and soft. This cleanser's formula contains rice bran oil. This oil has emollient effects, so it helps to repair the skin barrier and hydrate the skin. Additionally, a blend of organic lemon balm water and organic chamomile and cornflower extracts helps to soothe the skin. Even more, they provide antioxidant effects, helping to protect the skin against free radical damage. All in all, this cleansing milk is able to clean and remove makeup while hydrating and calming the skin. It can be used on the entire face, including lips and eyes, and also the neck. It is suited for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Allegro Natura Organic Cleansing Milk 125ml (4.23 fl oz) to the face and neck. Gently massage the skin, using circular motions. Finally, thoroughly rinse using lukewarm water.

description: Allegro Natura Organic Bifasic Cleansing Micellar Water 125ml (4.23 fl oz) effectively cleans the skin while leaving it hydrated and soothed. This micellar water combines ingredients in two different phases that blend together when mixed, providing not only cleansing but also emollient and calming effects to the skin. So, this product contains a blend of oils, such as organic grapeseed oil, helping to nourish dry skin. Additionally, aloe vera enhances the moisturizing effects and also helps to soothe the skin, along with chamomile and calendula extracts. Last but not least, this product helps to protect the skin against damage caused by oxidative stress from the environment, thanks to the antioxidants present in organic kiwi water and many of the other natural ingredients of the formula. All in all, this micellar water helps to maintain healthy-looking skin during the cleansing step. Due to its moisturizing and calming effects, it is ideal for dry and sensitive skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
First, shake the product well, in order to mix the two phases. Apply an adequate amount of Allegro Natura Organic Bifasic Cleansing Micellar Water 125ml (4.23 fl oz) onto a cotton pad and gently rub it across the face and eyes. It's not necessary to rinse afterward.

description: Allegro Natura Organic Micellar Cleansing Water 125ml (4.23 fl oz) is ideal for daily cleansing of combination to oily skin. This micellar water's formula contains a blend of organic ingredients to effectively clean, protect and purify the skin while helping to control excess shine. Accordingly, green tea extract provides antioxidant, soothing, and sebum-controlling effects. Rose water helps to tone the skin, being a mild astringent, and therefore helping to control excess oil and shine. The formula is also enriched with organic kiwi water, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid, for additional hydrating, antioxidant, soothing, and sebum-regulating effects. Even more, this product is suitable for sensitive skin and can also be used for cleansing the eye area. In summary, this micellar water is ideal for cleansing and decreasing excess shine in combination to oily skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an adequate amount of Allegro Natura Organic Micellar Cleansing Water 125ml (4.23 fl oz) onto a cotton pad and gently rub it across the face and eyes. It's not necessary to rinse afterward.

description:
HAAN Niacinamide Purifying Face Cleanser Gel cleanses the skin while purifying and clarifying it. Moreover, thanks to the Niacinamide, a form of vitamin B3, in the formula, it regulates oil production, reduces inflammation, and improves the overall texture of the skin. In fact, it reduces the appearance of pores, dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Additionally, it calms redness which results in a more even skin texture and tone. Lastly, with 97% ingredients of natural origin, this balancing cleanser strengthens the skin barrier.
In the end, this product provides a thorough and gentle cleanse, leaving the skin feeling refreshed and clarified while regulating oil production. Hence, making it ideal for those with oily or acne-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply HAAN Niacinamide Purifying Face Cleanser Gel in the morning and evening. Firstly, gently massage it onto wet skin in circular motions. Then, rinse it thoroughly with water.

description:
Rilastil Difesa Cleansing Face Cream 200ml (6.76 fl oz) is specifically indicated for sensitive and reactive skin. This is thanks to a minimalist formula that presents the utmost respect for this skin type or concern. That said, the formula only contains the essentials to gently clean the skin, containing Witch Hazel extract which has anti-inflammatory properties. Besides, this mild cleansing product does not require rinsing and the cream texture provides comfort to the skin. As a result, this cleanser not only cleans the skin but also soothes it. 
Equally important, it is fragrance-free and preservative-free. This is because this cleanser was formulated taking into consideration the needs of very sensitive and reactive skin, that easily reacts to common cosmetics. In case of such intolerance and even predisposition to allergies and eczema or dermatitis, this product is the ideal cleanser for your daily routine. All in all, this emollient cream soothes and cleanses sensitive skin without the need to rinse off. In short, if you're skin is very sensitive or reactive to common cosmetics, this cleanser might be a good choice to clean the face.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Witch Hazel extract, or Hamamelis Virginiana extract, is rich in tannins which have antioxidant properties. At the same time, this extract has anti-inflammatory properties thus providing soothing benefits and consequently reducing skin irritation and inflammation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Rilastil Difesa Cleansing Face Cream 200ml (6.76 fl oz) to a cotton pad or reusable alternative and gently swipe it over the face and eyes to clean the skin. No need to rinse.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Beauty of Joseon Radiance Cleansing Balm 100ml (3.38 fl oz) cleans the skin with efficacy while delivering the utmost respect. To begin with, this balm elevates your skincare routine through a sensorial experience. It has a soft balm texture that melts upon contact with the skin, to melt away all impurities. Nonetheless, this product is incredibly formulated to maintain its solid sherbet texture without being affected by bathroom temperature and humidity! Most importantly, the oil-based formulation will effortlessly melt away makeup and sebum, presenting an effective cleansing solution. Even more, it removes lip and eye makeup such as mascara and eyeliner without stinging the eyes.
At the same time, the formula is infused with ingredients that embody centuries-old wisdom in Korean history. In particular, this formula features Rice bran and various grain extracts that provide the skin with moisture. In other words, this cleanser does not strip down the skin and avoids the feeling of tightness, leaving the skin feeling comfortable. All in all, this cleanser provides a pleasant and effective cleaning experience to be your getaway to perfectly clean skin. As such, it is a great addition to your double cleansing routine in order to effectively remove makeup.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Rice Bran is rich in minerals and amino acids. It moisturizes the skin and, consequently, keeps it hydrated and radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take a coin-sized amount of Beauty of Joseon Radiance Cleansing Balm 100ml (3.38 fl oz) with the spatula and apply it to dry skin, massaging gently. Then, rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

description:
Clarins Gentle Peeling Smooth Away Cream is a facial scrub that gently removes dead cells and impurities to reveal radiant and smooth skin. The texture is purifying and suitable for all skin types, even to the most sensitive skin. In order to provide amazing and visible results, the formula blends Great Burdock and Primrose extract. Great Burdock has a purifying and cleansing action while soothes the skin. At the same time, Primrose extract helps to maintain an ideal pH balance and help to keep clean and radiant skin. Equally important, this facial scrub is formulated without alcohol, essential oil, fragrance and silicones.
With the everyday-cleanse the skin is free from impurities and excess oils, but alone, it is not enough. Once or twice a week, the skin needs a more in-depth cleanse to remove excess dead cells and to unclog the pores. This gentle facial scrub comforts the skin and helps to reveal the natural radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Gentle Peeling Smooth Away Cream onto the dry skin of the face and neck, avoiding the eye area. Leave the product on the skin for about one minute before massaging gently, from the center of the face outwards. Lastly, rinse it off with lukewarm water and follow with a lotion and a moisturizer.

description: Uriage Bariederm Cleansing Cica-Gel is a hygiene product for irritated face and body skin for all family. It is a cleansing, soothing and purifying gel indicated to reduce the discomfort sensations triggered by micro-organisms, with a ultra-rich formula to keep the skin moisturized. Copper and Zinc Gluconates limit bacterial proliferation, and Uriage Thermal Water soothes the skin, protecting it and preventing new irritations.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Bariederm Cleansing Cica-Gel on the wet skin and massage to transform the gel into foam. Rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with the eyes.

description: Uriage Roséliane Dermo-Cleansing Fluid is a cleansing lotion that eliminates all traced of make-up and impurities while guaranteeing high tolerance for sensitive skins subject to redness. Formulated with a careful selection of plant extracts that includes Apricot Kernel Oil, which contains strong anti-inflammatory and soothing properties, and Uriage Thermal Water, which relieves sensations of discomfort, this lotion provides the skin with purity, freshness and instant well-being.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Roséliane Dermo-Cleansing Fluid all over the face, neck and eye contour area using a cotton pad. Repeat with a new cotton pad until the skin is completely free of any traces of make-up or impurities. No need to rinse.

description:
This set contains the following products:

Nivea Refreshing 24h Moisture Day Cream SPF15 50ml
Labello Soft Rosé Lip Balm 4.8g
Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Normal Skin 200ml

Nivea Refreshing 24h Moisture Day Cream SPF15 gives an instant feeling of moisture and hydration that lasts for up to 24h. The presence of Glycerin results in the ability to retain water on the skin, protect against irritation and also repair the skin barrier. On the other hand, Shea Butter is responsible for its emollient properties and for soothing the skin. And the Vitamin E in the product leads to an antioxidant activity that protects against free radicals and UV rays. With a lightweight formula, quickly absorbed through the skin, this daily moisturizer leaves the skin hydrated and with a refreshing and plumping feeling. In addition, the presence of sunscreen filters allows this product to also protect the skin against UVA and UVB. All in all, it not only deeply hydrates the skin for up to 24 hours but also refreshes, plumps and protects the skin being perfect for everyday use.
Labello Soft Rosé Lip Balm  is an iconic product that not only deeply nourishes your lips but also enhances its natural pink undertone. In fact, this unique lip balm is the perfect blend between care and beauty, leaving your lips smooth and shiny, at the same time. On one side, the incredibly hydrating benefits of this formula are able to keep your skin soft and comfortable for up to 24 hours. Like so, this lip balm not only provides instant nourishment but also prevents future dryness. Concurrently, with each application, the Labello Soft Rosé Lip Balm heightens the natural beauty of your lips, providing a soft fragrance and a delicate tone, as well.
Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Normal Skin is a practical cleanser that offers five benefits in a single product. This all-in-one formula not only removes makeup but also cleanses the skin while moisturizing, without leaving any product residue, allowing your skin to breathe. Moreover, this cleanser is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested as well as fragrance-free so it is safe to use on the face, eyes, or lips. Thanks to its micellar technology, it does not require rinsing, ensuring a practical cleansing experience for those with normal skin types.
