description:
This set contains the following products:

Nivea Nutritive Day Cream - Dry and Sensitive Skin SPF15 50ml
Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free 200ml
Labello Strawberry Shine Lip Balm 4.8g

Nivea Nutritive Day Cream - Dry and Sensitive Skin SPF15 is a meticulously crafted formula designed to provide intense nourishment and long-lasting hydration for dry and sensitive skin. Infused with natural Almond Oil and Magnolia Extract, it deeply moisturizes the skin for up to 24 hours, ensuring a balance in the skin's moisture level. This formula not only smoothens and nourishes the skin but also shields it from external stressors. Dermatologically approved for its compatibility, this day cream with SPF 15 offers added protection against sun-induced damage, making it an ideal daily skincare solution for maintaining healthy, hydrated, and protected skin.
Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free 200ml is a practical cleanser that offers five benefits in a single product. To begin with, this micellar water effectively cleans all impurities and removes makeup in a single gesture while being gentle on the skin. At the same time, its formula provides soothing and hydrating benefits. And lastly, it leaves the skin soft and smooth. That said, this cleanser is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested as well as fragrance-free so it is safe to use on the face, eyes, or lips. As a matter of fact, it was even formulated to meet the needs of sensitive skin, being suitable for all skin types due to its gentle and soothing formula. Thanks to its micellar technology, it does not require rinsing so it is a very practical product.
Labello Strawberry Shine Lip Balm is the perfect blend of care and beauty since it deeply nourishes the lips while providing a beautiful shine and color. In fact, this multipurpose composition promises to deliver not only smooth and healthy skin but also a fun glossy finish. On one side, the Strawberry Shine Lip Balm has a soft red color and a delicious strawberry aroma. Infused with Shine Pigments, this unique lip balm adds a touch of color and radiance to your lips. At the same time, besides its beautifying properties, the Strawberry Shine Lip Balm ensures that your lips have optimal hydration levels for up to 24 hours. The result? You will be able to target chapped lips and flaunt a trendy look, simultaneously!
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Holika Holika Mugwort Pure Essence Foam Cleanser 150ml (5.07 fl oz) provides deep cleansing with a formula that contains Mugwort Extract that was fermented for three years. Thus, it includes exceptional toning, anti-inflammatory and antiseptic properties. Moreover, this leads to balanced sebum levels and less irritable skin. On top of that, it improves tissue renewal and enhances the skin's resistance to external aggressors, contributing to faster wound healing and relieving any swelling.
On another note, the Charcoal present in this cleanser ensures exfoliation and unclogs the pores. You can say goodbye to any impurities and dead skin cells. Last, but not least, it boosts cell growth and improves the skin texture.
In the end, besides getting a clearer complexion, it leaves it bright and calms it down.
how_to_use:
How to use
Mix a small amount of Holika Holika Mugwort Pure Essence Foam Cleanser 150ml (5.07 fl oz) with a small amount of water. Then, apply it to a damp face and massage it in a circular motion. Finally, rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

description:
Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is a practical cleanser that offers five benefits in a single product. To begin with, this micellar water effectively cleans all impurities and removes makeup in a single gesture while being gentle on the skin. At the same time, its formula provides soothing and hydrating benefits. And lastly, it leaves the skin soft and smooth. That said, this cleanser is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested as well as fragrance-free so it is safe to use on the face, eyes, or lips. As a matter of fact, it was even formulated to meet the needs of sensitive skin, being suitable for all skin types due to its gentle and soothing formula. Thanks to its micellar technology, it does not require rinsing so it is a very practical product. Even more, this 100ml capacity turns it ideal to take with you anywhere or while traveling. 
In addition to respecting the skin, this micellar water also respects the environment given its vegan formula and packaging with 95% of recycled material (excluding caps and labels).
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free 100ml (3.38 fl oz)  into a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, swipe it over your face, eyes, and lips with gentle movements to completely remove the makeup.

description: Uriage Refreshing Make-up Removing Jelly 150ml (5 fl oz) is a soft cleansing gel that helps to clean and purify the skin, while also being able to remove makeup. Due to the presence of soft cleansing agents, this product cleanses the skin without stripping it, which leaves a fresh and comfortable feeling on the skin. With the combination of Uriage Thermal Water and Edelweiss Extract, besides cleansing the skin, this gel is also able to soothe, improve the skin barrier and prevent the proliferation of bacteria. The presence of Glycerin provides this formulation with humectant properties, which help to not only hydrate the skin by capturing water present in the air but also protect it from external aggressors. With the regular use of this product, in the morning and/or evening, it leaves the skin clear, soft, and smooth.
how_to_use:
How to use
Lather Uriage Refreshing Make-up Removing Jelly 150ml (5 fl oz) on your hands with some water. Then apply the foam to your face and softly massage using circular motions in order to deeply cleanse the skin. Then rinse the product thoroughly with water until the product is fully removed. Follow up with your normal skincare routine.

description: Sisley Paris Eye and Lip Gel Make-Up Remover 120ml (4 fl oz) is a high-end makeup remover specially designed to remove stubborn and waterproof makeup from the eye and lip area. It has been ophthalmologically tested. On top of being extremely effective, it is also very gentle so it doesn't irritate these delicate areas. At the same time, it infuses the skin with skincare benefits by hydrating and refreshing it, without leaving an oily feeling. Additionally, it reduces the loss of lashes associated with makeup removal, as it enhances and softens them. Hence, the eye area looks more rested and luminous. Due to its melting gel texture, it applies easily and provides moments of comfort, leaving the skin soft and cleansed. In the end, this makeup remover creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the face and mind. Expect the area around the eyes and lips to be free of dust and impurities.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Eye and Lip Gel Make-Up Remover 120ml (4 fl oz) either with a cotton pad or with the fingertips onto the eyes and/or lips. Then, massage from the inside out in circular movements. Repeat until all the makeup has been removed. If you use the fingertips, finish the procedure with a cotton pad and do not rinse.

description: Uriage Toléderm Control Make-up Removing Milky Gel 150ml (5 fl oz) is a soft cleansing milky gel that helps to clean and purify the skin, while also being able to remove makeup. Due to the presence of soft cleansing agents, this product cleanses the skin without stripping it, which leaves a comfortable feeling on the skin. With the combination of Uriage Thermal Water and Glycerin, besides cleansing the skin, this milky gel is also able to soothe, improve the skin barrier and protect the skin from external aggressors. The presence of Squalane provides this formulation with nourishing properties. This helps to not only hydrate the skin but also restore the skin barrier. With the regular use of this product, in the morning and/or evening, it leaves the skin clear, soft, and hydrated. Due to its minimalist formula, this product can be safely used on allergic or intolerant skin types without causing irritation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Toléderm Control Make-up Removing Milky Gel 150ml (5 fl oz) with a cotton pad/washable cleansing pad or with fingertips. The product does not need to be rinsed off, however, if you feel more comfortable you can rinse it with water. Follow up with your normal skincare routine.

description:
Codex Labs Bia Gentle Cleansing Oil 30ml (1.01fl oz) is a light and effective cleansing oil that removes impurities and makeup without disrupting the skin's moisture barrier. Infused with an impressive blend of nourishing and protective ingredients, this cleanser promises to leave your skin matte and purified, supporting hydration levels simultaneously. In fact, components like Borage Flower Oil, Chia Seed Oil, and Oat Lipids prevent water loss while soothing and nourishing your complexion. Even more, the presence of Blackcurrant Seed shields the skin from environmental aggressions supplying a rejuvenating action, as well.
In addition to these benefits, the Bia Gentle Cleansing Oil also provides a pleasant user experience thanks to its unique texture. The rich oily consistency becomes a milky emulsion when in contact with water ensuring an effortless rinsing process.
To conclude, the Bia Gentle Cleansing Oil has a vegan composition and is certificated as a cruelty-free product by the Leaping Bunny Program.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Codex Labs Bia Gentle Cleansing Oil 30ml (1.01fl oz) as part of your regular morning and evening skincare routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the wet skin of your face and neck with the help of your fingers. Then, gently massage the formula with rotating movements in order to melt impurities and makeup. Finish by rinsing thoroughly. Discover the remaining Bia Collection to improve your results.

description: Babé Micellar Water is a cleansing micellar water that in a single gesture removes both impurities and makeup from face, eyes and lips. Due to the presence of a soothing complex that helps reduce itching and irritation, this product is suitable for all skin types including those more sensible. In addition, it also contains moisturizing ingredients. Altogheter, this cleansing water provides comfort, freshness and moisture to the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Babé Micellar Water  to both face and eyes, using a cotton pad. Repeat application if necessary. Do not rinse.

description:
A-Derma Biology Micellar Water Hydra-Cleansing is a refreshing cleanser suitable for fragile skin that removes makeup and impurities. Containing 100% of ingredients of natural origin, this refreshing water cleanser allows a quick and thorough cleanse without rinsing, suitable for the eye area. The formula feels incredibly gentle on the skin and manages to cleanse without leaving the skin feeling dry. This product replaces the original A-Derma Sensifluid Water Cleansing Micellar now with a new and improved formulation.
Featuring Rhealba® oat together with dandelion, this vegan formula not only cleanses but also replenishes fragile skin. Organic Rhealba® oat hydrates the skin all the while helping to bring it back to balance. At the same time, dandelion extract works to protect the skin with powerful anti-pollution action. Both hydrating and non-sticky, this cleansing water was tested on allergic skin and grants a complete cleanse all the while being gentle on the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply A-Derma Biology Micellar Water Hydra-Cleansing over a cotton pad and then work it gently across the face, including the eye area. No need for rinsing afterward.

description: D'AVEIA PTA Acneic Skin Cleansing Emulsion 200ml (6.76fl oz) is a gentle fluid emulsion that provides daily cleansing for your skin. Specifically, this facial cleanser is indicated for oily skin, with acne tendency or seborrheic dermatitis. This is because this emulsion has a seborregulatory, keratolytic and calming action, ideal for these types of skin. Furthermore, this product helps to deeply cleanse your skin so that it is free of any traces of dirt or accumulated oil. In turn, the presence of Salicylic Acid prevents sebum retention, while Azeoglycine reduces the oiliness of the skin's surface. This way your physiological balance is restored while you also gain a new, cleaner and fresher appearance. Regarding skin sensitivity and irritation, Beta Glucan, Europaea Oil and Gamma-Orizanol exert an anti-irritant and soothing action. Finally, according to dermatological tests by D'AVEIA, the skin has a lesser tendency to oily throughout the use of this emulsion. All in all, this product helps to deeply cleanse your skin while helping to reduce oiliness and acne.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply D'AVEIA PTA Acneic Skin Cleansing Emulsion 200ml (6.76fl oz) to your moistened skin and massage it gently. Leave it for a few minutes and then rinse. Can be used on face and torso.

description:
Mádara Acne Sebum Control Clear Skin Wash 140ml (4.73fl oz) is a gentle and balancing daily cleanser that was specially developed for teenagers or adults that struggle with mild to moderate acne. In fact, this product has a purifying and refreshing effect that is extremely efficient when it comes to fighting concerns such as whiteheads, blackheads and pimples. The presence of Jupiter Stem Cells on the formula helps to prevent the proliferation of bacteria that cause acne or other skin imbalances. Even more, Fermented Polysaccharides help to regulate sebum production.
Equally important, the Acne Clear Skin Wash focuses on protecting the skin's natural balance and soothing any irritation. On one side, this rinse-off wash uses gentle Plant-derived Cleansing Agents without harsh surfactants. These components are capable of cleaning the surface of the skin and removing oils without altering the Ph balance or creating sensitivity. Additionally, this composition contains Extracts of Lichen and Maté Tea, both soothing ingredients with antioxidant benefits.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara Acne Sebum Control Clear Skin Wash 140ml (4.73fl oz) to damp skin, massaging gently. Finish by rinsing off and following with your selected moisturizer. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain maximum results

description: Embryolisse Micellar Lotion is a micellar lotion suitable for even the most sensitive skin, as it is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested. Thus, this lotion has the ability to deeply cleanse the skin and remove traces of makeup on the face, eyes and lips. Furthermore, to make this possible, this product is enriched with micelles, a gentle skin-cleaning property. In addition, it has cornflower, camomile and witch-hazel water that, when combined with glycerin, help to smooth and soothe the skin. In this way, irritated skin or skin with any sensation of discomfort is immediately cared for and hydrated. Finally, your skin is really cleaner and free from any impurities such as pollution and accumulation of dirty traces. That way you get a clean, fresh, hydrated and smoother skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Embryolisse Lotion Micellaire on the skin using a cotton pad. Repeat until the pad becomes clean. Pat gently to dry.

description:
Benton Honest Cleansing Foam has a creamy, rich texture that is ideal to cast away daily impurities, makeup, or excess oil/sebum. In fact, it cleanses the epidermis gently yet effectively but also without stripping away the skin's protective moisture barrier. Moreover, mostly made of natural ingredients, this foam relies on extremely nourishing components. Among others, Camellia Sinensis Leaf and Centella Asiatica Extract unite to deliver the ultimate revitalizing treatment.
Free of dirt as well as irregularities in tone and texture, pores can breathe better. At the same time, this 100% vegan option offers a delicate exfoliation that stimulates the growth of new skin cells. Fortified, these also improve the organic radiance of one's overall appearance. To the same extent, this comes across as a highly inclusive option that suits all complexion types, refraining from using harmful artificial elements. All in all, you're like to feel your skin tightening as it receives all the moisturizing benefits included in this dermatologically tested cleansing foam.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous portion of Benton Honest Cleansing Foam and massage the creamy formula all over your wet face. Wait until it starts to transform into foam and perform circular/upward motions with your hands. Continue doing so to cleanse extra congested skin profoundly. Then, rinse the product off resorting to room temperature water. Remember to be as delicate as possible. Finally, explore the rest of Benton's anti-aging and revitalizing ranges. As this is just the first step of a healthy skincare routine, ideally use other options that suit your skin type, allowing it to live up to its full potential.

description:
Benton Deep Green Tea Cleansing Foam revives dull skin by casting away all sorts of daily impurities and detoxifying delicately. Thanks to organic surfactants as well as Green Tea, it boosts the energy of all skin types while also conferring the ultimate antioxidant shield. To the same extent, Centella Asiatica and Heartleaf work towards soothing damaged skin tissues, supplying a healthy dose of nutrients. Together, these tend to speed up cell regeneration, repairing and gently exfoliating without stripping the skin's moisture barrier. Thus, after each application, you'll notice quick improvements, as this option minimizes irregularities in tone/texture.
In fact, Benton prides itself on delivering clean as well as natural skincare products. Besides, the brand's ranges aim to reverse the harsher effects of time. Additionally, this gentle yet highly effective cleanser establishes a trustworthy protection layer against external threats or harmful free radicals. All in all, Benton desires to be as transparent, eco-friendly, and green as possible. Foams such as these are made with the utmost care, refraining from endangering already scarce resources. Finally, decongested, revitalized and feather-like, your facial skin can thrive and become a little bit more radiant every day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous portion of Benton Deep Green Tea Cleansing Foam after using a make-up removing balm. Then, smooth this creamy liquid all over your face, massaging in circular and upward motions with great care. Wait until your complexion is clear. There's no need to wet the skin in order to activate the foam. However, after each massage rinse the product off resorting to warm water. Don't forget to stay away from particularly sensitive areas such as your mouth and eyes. Finally, finish off the rest of your skincare routine with your favorite toning and moisturizing options.

description:
Clarins Soothing Gentle Foaming Cleanser is a soothing cleanser that delicately removes impurities and makeup, suitable for very dry and sensitive skin. The texture is soft, creamy and naturally foamy, containing botanical extracts that create a comfortable lather and excluding soap and SLS from the formula.
The cleanser combines multiple botanical extracts in order to obtain various and complementary benefits. To begin with, organic alpine plant extracts of golden gentian and lemon balm, part of Clarins' Gentle Complex, contribute to softening the skin, allowing an ultra-gentle cleansing experience. Similarly, moringa helps to dissolve and remove makeup as well as impurities and pollutants. In addition, Roman camomile adds soothing and toning properties to the formula while shea butter deeply nourishes the skin and provides comfort. After each use, the skin is delicately cleansed and feels incredibly soft, smooth and comfortable, with a pleasant floral scent.
how_to_use:
How to use
Work the Clarins Soothing Gentle Foaming Cleanser onto your hands with some water in order to create a lather. Then, apply it onto the skin and massage it evenly onto the face and neck. Press and lift your hands on the face repeatedly to lift off all the impurities, pollution particles and makeup. Rinse it off thoroughly and pat the skin dry. Lastly, apply your favorite toner and facial moisturizer.

description:
TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Cleansing Foam is a rich, gentle foam that helps repair your skin's barrier while cleaning your face of dirt, impurities and excess oil. Moreover, this foam softens your skin leaving it more hydrated, nourished and refreshed. On the other hand, it contains some anti-aging properties that help to smooth out fine wrinkles and fine lines.
For this to be possible, this foam contains in its composition Green Propolis extract, which is the key ingredient of this range of products. This property contains antibacterial and anti-inflammatory actions that help balance, heal and soothe all skin types. It is also ideal for skin with acne as it helps to repair the skin quickly and effectively while cleaning it deeply. In short, this light foam helps to cleanse your skin while moisturizing, calming, repairing and healing.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Green Propolis extract helps balance the skin's barrier while repairing, healing and making it healthier. It also has great antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties ideal for skin that suffers from acne.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take an appropriate amount of TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Cleansing Foam on wet palms, lather enough, massage your face, and then rinse thoroughly with warm water.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

ingredients: Not found

description: Holika Holika Soda Pore Cleansing Enzyme Powder Wash 60g (2.11 oz) deeply cleanses and purifies the skin, targeting pore-clogging impurities and excess sebum. Moreover, the powder wash contains Papaya Enzymes which exfoliate and remove dead skin cells, revealing a smoother and brighter complexion. Thus, it refines the appearance of pores and controls excess oil production, promoting a more balanced and clear skin texture. In the end, you get a radiant complexion with an even tone.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Holika Holika Soda Pore Cleansing Enzyme Powder Wash 60g (2.11 oz) in the morning and evening. Firstly, put the powder in the palm of your hand and add a bit of warm water. Then, work it up until it forms a gentle lather. Next, massage it to the face. Finally, rinse thoroughly.

description:
Holika Holika Daily Fresh Cleansing Foam Rice casts away daily impurities, as well as makeup, traces gently yet effectively. In fact, this formula confers a newfound smoothness to your face, refreshing it without clogging pores. Thanks to Rice Extract, this option smooths out wrinkles/fine lines and speeds up metabolic processes, moisturizing drier complexions. Thus, the epidermis is bound to feel feather-like, as this foam contributes to slowing down initial aging signs, offering a refreshing, softening finish. In addition, it restores aging skin as its nutritive properties renew cells and inhibit the development of deeper wrinkles.
Rich in amino acids as well as minerals, the core Rice Extract enhances one's defensive barrier against all kinds of external threats. All in all, a small portion of this cleanser prevents harmful free radicals or bacteria from penetrating vulnerable skin tissues. Meanwhile, Soapwort Extract contains saponins, known for their anti-inflammatory properties which also improve metabolism. Finally, this is a great option for irritated or acne-prone skin types, balancing out their tone/texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Place a tiny portion of Holika Holika Daily Fresh Cleansing Foam Rice in the palm of your hand and mix it with a bit of water. Allow the formula to foam up and apply it all over your face. Make sure the skin is damp beforehand and then massage the product in circular motions. After a few minutes, rinse abundantly with lukewarm water. Finally, explore the rest of the Holika Holika Daily Fresh Cleansing range to see if other options also appeal to you.

description:
Juice To Cleanse Water Wash Balm 100g (3.52 oz) is a unique and innovative skincare product that presents a refreshing twist in the realm of facial cleansers. That said, this cleansing balm stands out with its transformative texture and water-based composition, contrasting the conventional oil-based formulas. The transformative texture goes through a 3 step process. To explain, it starts as a refreshing balm that melts into the skin and transforms into a cream texture. Upon contact with water, it creates an abundant foam!  It is designed to remove makeup, sunscreen, dirt, and all kinds of impurities from the skin. The outcome is not only clean but also soft and hydrated skin.
Its remarkable formula, referred to as a 'recipe' by Juice to Cleanse, includes a blend of fruit juices such as lemon, lime, mango, papaya, and pineapple. These ingredients contribute to the product's ability to brighten the skin. Additionally, papain, an enzyme found in papaya extract, offers a mild exfoliating effect that leaves the skin glowing and is soft enough for daily use. Another delightful aspect of this cleanser is its mild citrus scent, which makes the cleansing process an enjoyable and refreshing experience. Lastly, this cleanser is suitable for all skin types, even those with sensitivity.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Juice To Cleanse Water Wash Balm 100g (3.52 oz) to dry skin and massage. Then, add water and rinse it off.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

Pestle & Mortar Erase Balm Cleanser 50g
Pestle & Mortar Renew Gel Cleanser 50g


Pestle & Mortar Erase Balm Cleanser  is the first step of your double cleansing routine. With this in mind, the brand has created a super smooth balm made of all-natural ingredients which removes all traces of make-up and SPF. This balmy cleanser melts into a luxurious oil that smooths over your skin in order to dissolve all impurities and gently remove them from the skin. What's more, given the amazing blend of natural oils, this balm ensures that the skin is hydrated even during the cleansing process. This time, you will be able to transform a usually harsh process into the first step of caring for your skin, thus ensuring that the skin is nourished during the process. Given that this product is made of natural oils, please keep in mind that the texture might differ from batch to batch and even due to environmental factors, so if your balm looks a bit grainy, it's still totally safe to use and will give you the same results. 

Pestle & Mortar Renew Gel Cleanser  is your second cleanser for your double cleansing routine. First, this incredibly smooth gel-in-oil has a thick texture that glides onto the skin to deeply cleanse it. Given that this product should be applied onto dry skin, the formula contains a super blend of natural extracts including papaya, known for its enzymes which gently exfoliate the skin. Moreover, the addition of superoxide dismutase boosts your skin's defenses against free radicals, known for causing premature aging. Thus, this formula gently cleanses the skin, improves the skin tone, unblocks pores and is suitable for every skin type.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Ziaja Cleansing Foam Face Wash Sensitive Skin 150ml (5.2 fl oz) is a gentle yet effective cleanser for people with sensitive skin. This foam contains 98% ingredients of natural origin and cleanses the skin thoroughly while also removing makeup. Additionally, it is suitable for individuals with sensitive eyes, including contact lens wearers. Its formula is enriched with allantoin, a soothing ingredient that helps calm redness and irritation, as well as lactic acid, sodium PCA, niacinamide, and panthenol. These ingredients ensure that the skin is not only clean but also hydrated, maintaining its natural moisture balance and a healthy skin barrier.
The foam’s delicate fragrance enhances the cleansing experience, making it a pleasant part of your daily skincare routine. All in all, this is a good option for those seeking a gentle yet effective cleanser that can also handle makeup removal. It leaves the skin feeling refreshed, soft, and clean without any tightness or dryness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Cleansing Foam Face Wash Sensitive Skin 150ml (5.2 fl oz) onto damp skin of the face. Then, gently massage the skin. Finally, thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water.

description:
SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Poremizing Deep Cleansing Foam 125ml (4.22 fl oz) is a facial cleanser that thoroughly cleanses dirt, makeup residues, and sunscreen from the skin, promising a deep cleanse without compromising skin health. This product's formula includes Himalayan pink salt, a natural salt that boasts over 80 different minerals. So, its salinity creates an osmotic pressure that helps to draw out impurities from the skin's surface and inside the pores. Moreover, kaolin is a clay that absorbs excess sebum and dirt, further ensuring that the pores are left unclogged. Then, the combined action of papain and vinegar provides a gentle exfoliating effect. These ingredients work in tandem to remove dead skin cells, delivering a smooth, silky, and renewed complexion. Additionally, Madagascan Centella asiatica extract protects and soothes the skin, making the product safe even for those with sensitive skin profiles. 
This creamy textured paste effortlessly transforms into a rich foam, ensuring that dirt, excess sebum in the pores, and even stubborn sunscreen residues are effectively washed away. In conclusion, this cleanser is a great solution for those seeking a deep cleanse, promising radiant, refreshed, and soothed skin post-cleanse.
how_to_use:
How to use
First, apply SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Poremizing Deep Cleansing Foam 125ml (4.22 fl oz) onto damp hands. Rub them together to lather the product. Then, apply to the skin and gently massage to cleanse it. Finally, thoroughly rinse using lukewarm water.

description:
PURITO From Green Cleansing Oil 200ml (6.76 fl oz) is a nourishing cleansing oil that effortlessly lifts impurities, dirt, and makeup from the skin without compromising its natural moisture balance. This cleansing oil stands out for its minimalistic approach, containing only 10 ingredients. Central to its formulation is a blend of five nature-derived oils: Olive, Sweet Almond, Grape Seed, Sunflower, and Jojoba Oil. Each of these oils plays a crucial role in breaking down and sweeping away not only makeup and sunscreen but also everyday dirt and impurities, all while nourishing and softening the skin.
Additionally, this product emulsifies quickly upon contact with water. This transformation creates a rich milky texture that washes away easily, revealing soft, clean skin without any tightness. In other words, its gentle yet effective cleansing action ensures that the skin remains balanced and hydrated. In essence, this cleansing oil offers a nourishing blend of natural oils, leaving the skin feeling soft, supple, and perfectly prepped for the next steps in your skincare routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense 2 to 3 pumps of PURITO From Green Cleansing Oil 200ml (6.76 fl oz) onto the palms and apply it to dry skin of the face. Then, gently massage in circular motions for at least 30 seconds. Next, dampen your hands with water and restart massaging to emulsify the product. Finally, thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water. Follow with Purito From Green Deep Foaming Cleanser for a double cleanse, if desired.

description:
AXIS-Y Sunday Morning Refreshing Cleansing Foam 120ml (4.05 fl oz) helps to effectively cleanse the skin while ensuring it stays hydrated and nourished. Cleansing is a crucial step in the skincare routine, in order to remove dirt, pollutants, makeup residues, and excess oils from the skin. So, this cleanser is a great choice for the skin's daily cleansing needs, as it deeply cleanses the skin without stripping it of its natural moisture. In fact, gentle cleansing agents get rid of dirt and excess sebum that, if left unchecked, can lead to numerous skin concerns. And, thanks to hydrating ingredients such as Aquaxyl, this cleanser helps to enhance the skin's moisture levels, ensuring that it remains safeguarded from potential dehydration. But the nourishment doesn't stop there. Birch sap, teeming with vital nutrients, steps in to provide added moisturization, harmonize the oil-moisture balance, and fortify the skin's protective barrier in the process. 
Complementing the formula are six plant extracts that deliver soothing, antioxidant, and moisturizing effects. This cleanser's pH of 5.5 is also similar to the skin's natural pH levels, further supporting a healthy skin barrier. In sum, it promises a cleansing experience that rids your skin of undesired impurities, dirt, and excess oils. Yet, it leaves behind soft, supple, and more balanced skin with every wash.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply AXIS-Y Sunday Morning Refreshing Cleansing Foam 120ml (4.05 fl oz) to damp skin. Gently massage the skin to lather the product, using circular motions. Finally, rinse the product with lukewarm water.

description:
Dr. Ceuracle Hyal Reyouth Multi Cleansing Foaming Balm 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is an innovative 2-in-1 skincare formula that redefines convenience in daily cleansing routines. Seamlessly blending the benefits of a cleansing balm with a foaming cleanser, this product eliminates the need for double cleansing. To begin with, this product excels in removing impurities, sunscreen, and even makeup, ensuring a perfectly clean complexion. Mild exfoliating acids aid in gentle skin exfoliation and ensure a thorough removal of dirt and impurities. Additionally, this product boasts many moisturizing ingredients, leaving your skin feeling irresistibly soft and plump. The star is the 10 Hyal Complex, composed of 10 distinct types of hyaluronic acid, ensuring instantaneous surface hydration and sustained deeper moisture. Moreover, this product's low pH is similar to the skin's natural pH, minimizing the risk of irritation. 
This balm's transformative texture is also noteworthy. As it's massaged onto the skin, it adopts a creamy consistency, melting makeup and skincare products effortlessly. Then, in contact with water, it turns foamy, emulsifying impurities with ease. In summary, this product offers a harmonious blend of cleansing and hydrating, offering you a perfectly cleansed, soft, and smooth complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
First, apply a coin-sized amount of Dr. Ceuracle Hyal Reyouth Multi Cleansing Foaming Balm 100ml (3.38 fl oz) to dry skin of the face and neck. Massage the skin using circular motions for approximately 30 seconds. Then, add a small amount of water to lather the product and continue massaging the skin. Finally, thoroughly rinse using lukewarm water. Store the product at room temperature to prevent hardening of the balm.

description:
Dr. Ceuracle Vegan Kombucha Tea Creamy Wash Bar 100g (3.52 oz) is a gentle all-in-one cleanser for your face, body, and hair. Formulated with mild surfactants of vegetable origin such as coco-betaine and coconut acid, it effectively removes impurities and dirt without being harsh. It boasts hydrating and moisturizing ingredients like ceramides, trehalose, and betaine, enhanced by vegetable oils for extra moisturizing effects. Additionally, an alpha-hydroxy acid helps to cleanse and remove excess oil. Moreover, kombucha tea extract brings rich antioxidants and probiotics to protect the skin, supporting a healthy microbiome and strong skin barrier. 
This hydrating cleanser is formulated with a low pH that is similar to the skin's pH. It creates a rich and creamy foam that pampers the hair and doesn't leave the skin feeling dry or tight. All in all, this wash bar provides a comforting but effective cleanse, enveloping your skin and hair in softness and care!
how_to_use:
How to use
First, rub Dr. Ceuracle Vegan Kombucha Tea Creamy Wash Bar 100g (3.52 oz) onto wet skin of the face, body, and scalp, to lather the product. Then, gently massage to cleanse the skin and hair. Finally, rinse thoroughly using lukewarm water.

description:
Dr. Ceuracle Tea Tree Purifine 30 Cleansing Foam 150ml (5.07 fl oz) helps to deeply cleanse and purify the skin, while leaving it soft and hydrated. As the name suggests, this formula's star ingredient is Tea Tree, an ingredient known for its beneficial effects on acne-prone skin. So, this cleansing foam contains 30% tea tree extract as well as tea tree oil, delivering purifying and soothing effects to the skin and minimizing the appearance of acne lesions. Additionally, this cleanser's formula contains sea buckthorn extract, with antioxidant and soothing effects, as well as trehalose, a skin moisturizer. Even more, it has a skin-balanced pH and contains mild cleansers that effectively clean the skin without overly drying it. 
This cleansing foam has a gel texture that turns into a soft foam, enveloping the skin and perfectly cleansing it while delivering all of its benefits. It leaves the skin feeling soft and moisturized, without a feeling of tightness or discomfort. All in all, this is a great option if you're looking for a gentle cleanser for acne-prone skin, leaving it refreshed and purified.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Ceuracle Tea Tree Purifine 30 Cleansing Foam 150ml (5.07 fl oz) onto wet skin of the face. Gently massage the skin using circular motions. Finally, thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water and pat the skin dry.

description:
Arganicare Retinol A Facial Cleanser With Build-In Brush 150ml (5.07floz) delivers a solution for an effective cleanse and makeup removal, all while combating aging signs. Infused with the power of Retinol, renowned for its remarkable anti-aging properties, this cleanser boasts all the benefits of this ingredient. Not only does retinol possess potent antioxidant properties, but it also jumpstarts skin renewal. By promoting collagen synthesis, it effectively minimizes the appearance of aging signs, giving you a smoother and more youthful complexion. And this cleanser comes complete with a specially designed face brush. This thoughtful addition enhances the cleansing experience, providing a gentle massage and an exfoliating action too. Like so, it effectively removes impurities, and excess sebum, and unclogs pores. At the same time, pores are visibly reduced.
Furthermore, the formula features soothing cucumber extract and antioxidant-rich green tea extract. In addition, plant oils are responsible for providing nourishing properties, and maintaining optimal moisture levels. As such, the skin is left soft and supple after every cleanse. Ultimately, this cleanser ensures an effective cleansing while delivering anti-aging benefits. In short, adding this product to your skincare routine allows you to experience a rejuvenating cleansing experience while effectively removing impurities and makeup.
how_to_use:
How to use
Squeeze the tube of Arganicare Retinol A Facial Cleanser With Build-In Brush 150ml (5.07floz) until the soap comes out. Then, using the brush, massage the soap on damp skin of the face and neck in circular movements. Rinse with water.

description:
Ondo Beauty 36.5 Multiacids & Papaya Melting Cleansing Balm 100g (3.38 fl oz) is a cleansing balm that easily removes makeup, sunscreen, and impurities, leaving the skin clean, soft, and looking radiant. It is an ideal choice for those who seek a gentle yet thorough cleansing product that prepares the skin for the subsequent skincare routine. This balm easily melts upon contact with the skin, transforming into a buttery and silky consistency that effectively removes makeup and impurities. Moreover, the formula doesn't sting the eyes and is highly stable, maintaining its consistency even in summer.
It includes a combination of lightweight oils, such as sea buckthorn vitamin oil. This not only imparts a natural yellow color to the balm but also ensures the balm emulsifies effortlessly upon contact with water, making it easy to rinse off. So, the skin is not left with any greasy residue, but rather feels refreshed and clean. But this balm doesn't just cleanse the skin. In fact, the formula features acids naturally found in sugar cane and yuzu extracts, an Asian citrus fruit renowned for its high vitamin C content, as well as glycolic acid and gluconolactone. These acids work together with papaya extract, which contains the enzyme papain, to gently exfoliate the skin, refining its texture and enhancing its natural radiance. 
To elevate the sensory experience, the balm contains cedar and bergamot essential oils. These oils impart a subtle scent with citrus and woody notes, transforming the cleansing routine into a stimulating and enjoyable ritual. Moreover, it is cost-effective as only a small amount is needed to cleanse the entire face thoroughly. In essence, this product leaves the skin perfectly prepped for the rest of the skincare regimen. It is also a great option for the first step in a double cleanse routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a chickpea-sized amount of Ondo Beauty 36.5 Multiacids & Papaya Melting Cleansing Balm 100g (3.38 fl oz) to dry skin of the face. Gently massage the skin to start removing the makeup and impurities. Then, add water to emulsify and keep massaging. Finally, thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water. Follow with a second cleanser, if desired.

description: HAAN Hyaluronic Moisturizing Face Cleanser Gel deeply cleanses your skin while keeping it hydrated. Due to its key ingredient, Hyaluronic Acid, this cleanser has great abilities at retaining water and improving skin's elasticity. Thus, with 97% ingredients of natural origin, it attenuates the appearance of premature aging signs. Moreover, it protects the skin against external aggressors.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply HAAN Hyaluronic Moisturizing Face Cleanser Gel in the morning and evening. Firstly, gently massage it onto wet skin in circular motions. Then, rinse it thoroughly with water.

description: HAAN Peptide Nourishing Face Cleanser Gel cleanses the skin effectively while nourishing and hydrating it. Due to a formula with 97,1% ingredients of natural origin that work together, this cleanser provides deep hydration to the skin and restores the elasticity levels, leaving it smooth and supple. Moreover, it contains peptide, an active antioxidant that tackles signs of aging, brightens the skin and protects from pollution. As a result, this cleanser is ideal for dry skin, as the pores of dry skin are tighter, therefore causing more visible lines and less elasticity.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply HAAN Peptide Nourishing Face Cleanser Gel in the morning and evening. Firstly, gently massage it onto wet skin in circular motions. Then, rinse thoroughly with water.

description:
Revolution Skincare Ceramides Soothing Cleanser 236ml (7.98 fl oz) is a facial cleanser particularly formulated to maintain the skin's natural barrier. With this in mind, the formula features a powerhouse combination of 5 ceramides. Ceramides, the star component of this cleanser, are skin-identical molecules that play a crucial role in reinforcing the skin barrier, leading to hydrated and soft skin. Additionally, this cleanser's formula contains salicylic acid, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide. As a result, it offers a comprehensive skincare solution that hydrates, smooths, controls oil, minimizes pores, and helps prevent blemishes. Although suitable for all skin types, its formulation ensures 24-hour moisturization, making it especially beneficial for dry skin.
Furthermore, the formula is free from fragrances, dermatologist-approved as well as hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic. In summary, this product stands out as a gentle and versatile cleanser. Its blend of ceramides with hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and salicylic acid makes it a great addition to clean the skin while keeping its hydration.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Ceramides Soothing Cleanser 236ml (7.98 fl oz) to damp skin and massage. Rinse well with lukewarm water.

description:
Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water & Milk Sensitive Skin is a comfortable facial cleanser that removes makeup and smoothes the skin at the same time. The texture is lightweight and milky, suitable for the the particular needs of dry and sensitive skin. The formula is delicate and fragrance-free, ideal not only to cleanse the skin every day but also to remove the makeup of the face, eyes and lips. The secret lies in the formula: micelles offer a deeply purifying and cleansing action while the milky texture reduces the feeling of tightness, without leaving a greasy or sticky feel.
Cleansing is an essential step of any beauty routine, and nothing is more invigorating than the refreshing sensation of water. Micellar water offers you the sensation of water with the comfort of cleansing with a cotton pad in order to suit dry and sensitive skin needs. In addition to a revitalizing sensation, the micellar water offers multiple benefits with one simple step. It erases all traces of makeup, impurities, pollution and cleanses the skin. At the same time, it smoothes and comforts the skin, preparing it for your skincare regimen.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Micelles offer a deeply purifying and cleansing action.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with your morning and evening routines, saturate a cotton pad with the Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water & Milk Sensitive Skin and apply onto the face and neck.

description: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water is an innovative micellar water. Its enriched formula with hyaluronic acid ensures a proper hydration of the skin, all the while its 3 different types of micellar molecules efficiently cleanse the face of impurities and make-up (even waterproof mascara). Also, it draws out dirt and oil. Moreover, it is suitable for sensitive skin and can be used on the eyes since it is ophthalmologically and dermatologically tested. The skin is left with a refreshed look, moisturized as well as with a smoother texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water with a cotton pad over face and eyes. Do not rinse. Protect from freezing. For external use only.

description:
Skin Generics Gel-Oil To Milk Cleanser Sunflower + Almond Oil 100ml (3.33 fl oz) is a cleansing product with a unique texture designed specifically to remove makeup. For this purpose, this cleanser relies on a formula with a percentage of 84% of active complex, presenting a blend of selected oils. Equally important, the innovative texture starts with a gel and turns into an oil, and, subsequently, in contact with water, it turns into a luxurious milk. Like so, by emulsifying the product, it gently and effectively removes all traces of makeup and impurities from the skin. At the same time, it leaves the skin soft and comfortable after cleansing. Even more, this product is suitable for removing makeup in the eye area as well.
As a last note, this product does not contain mineral oils, parabens, sulfates, silicones or ingredients of animal origin. In conclusion, this vegan cleanser provides a pleasant sensorial experience that effortlessly removes makeup.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Skin Generics Gel-Oil To Milk Cleanser Sunflower + Almond Oil 100ml (3.33 fl oz) to the face, eyes, neck, and decolleté. Gently massage so the texture turns into an oil. Then, add water to emulsify, and lastly, rinse with water.

description:
Nivea Biodegradable Refreshing Cleansing Wipes x40 are soft biodegradable wipes that offer three actions in one product. Firstly, the gentle cleansing formula with natural ingredients effectively cleanses the skin. Most importantly, these wipes are also effective in removing makeup, even waterproof. Therefore, they provide a thorough cleansing. Nonetheless, they have a refreshing action too, and keep the skin hydrated with an alcohol-free formula enriched in Lotus Flower. In fact, this formula not only respects the skin but also the planet. The wipes are made of plant-based fibers, being biodegradable, and the formula contains 97% ingredients of natural origin. Additionally, the package contains 45% of repurposed material. So, they represent a sustainable choice.
As a last note, this product is specifically indicated for normal to combination skin and is suitable even for the eye area. To sum up, these wipes are a practical product that cleans the face in a single gesture. Thus, they become very convenient especially when on the move or traveling. Ideal for fast and effective makeup removal while taking care of both the skin and the planet.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Lotus Flower extract provides antioxidant protection but most importantly, it has soothing and moisturizing properties. As a result, it helps protect and hydrate the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take one wipe of Nivea Biodegradable Refreshing Cleansing Wipes x40 and gently clean the face with eyes closed. Make sure you properly seal the pack after use to keep the freshness of the wipes.

description: Sisley Paris Eau Efficace Gentle Make-Up Remover 300ml (10.1 fl oz) is a high-end rinse-free makeup remover that performs three different actions: removes makeup, cleanses and tones the skin. Due to its plant-based saponins, it has powerful cleansing properties and is able to remove impurities and pollution that accumulate on the surface of the skin. Hence, while freeing and clearing the skin, it allows the complexion to show off its natural radiance. At the same time, it cleanses the most stubborn makeup. On top of that, thanks to Linden Blossom Water and Neroli Extract in its formula, this cleanser soothes and relaxes the skin, providing moments of comfort. Moreover, its liquid texture makes it gentle to apply, in a way that is not harsh to the skin and is suitable for people with sensitive eyes and that wear contact lenses. Expect a cleansed and radiant complexion!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Eau Efficace Gentle Make-Up Remover 300ml (10.1 fl oz) by placing a cotton pad against the pump, and pressing two to three times in order to soak the pad. Firstly, wipe each eye with its own cotton pad. Secondly, with another pad wipe the rest of the face. Thirdly, if needed, reapply to remove any excess makeup. Finally, do not rinse.

description:
Noreva Actipur Micellar Water Cleanser Make-Up Remover 400ml is a multipurpose product that not only removes daily impurities but also eliminates makeup residues. Made without perfume, this cleansing solution is perfect for the daily care of oily to combination skin that struggles with sensitivity. In fact, after each application, the Actipur Micellar Water promises to leave your skin purified, mattified and deeply hydrated.
All of these benefits are possible thanks to a composition that resorts to Orange Blossom Hydrolate. As it happens, this active ingredient is responsible for a powerful purifying action that contributes to a balanced and healthy-looking complexion. Furthermore, the Actipur Micellar Water also contains Micelles - a component inspired by the skin's lipids that is able to capture impurities without disrupting the skin's natural protective layer.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Noreva Actipur Micellar Water Cleanser Make-Up Remover 400ml as part of your morning and evening routine. Pour the formula onto a cotton pad. Then, glide it gently on the skin of your face. Do not rinse.

description:
Revolution Skincare Aloe Vera Gentle Micellar Water 400ml has an extremely smooth and gentle texture perfectly suited to all skin types, including the most sensitive. In particular, this micellar water acts in the effective cleansing of the skin as well as in the total removal of make-up. In this sense, your entire face is thus free of impurities, excess oil, pollution particles, and make-up. The most sensitive skins also end up adapting quite well to this micellar water as it deeply soothes, comforts, and moisturizes them.
One of the main ingredients of this composition is Aloe Vera, an anti-inflammatory ingredient with famous soothing and also conditioning properties. In this case, more sensitive skins are actively soothed while becoming perfectly cleansed. For a moisturizing action, the presence of Glycerin here makes all the difference. Namely, it attracts water and binds it to the skin, keeping it hydrated and also shielded from environmental sources of irritation. Last but not least, Propylene Glycol works as a humectant and a hydration conditioner, helping you achieve optimal levels. Plus, its soothing effects fight off dryness, flaking, or roughness on any skin type.
how_to_use:
How to use
For best results, apply Revolution Skincare Aloe Vera Gentle Micellar Water 400ml to a cotton pad and sweep across the face to melt your makeup away.

description:
Codex Labs Antü Refreshing Gel Cleanser 125ml (4.23fl oz) was specially developed to gently yet effectively cleanse the skin on an everyday basis. In fact, by resorting to the power of natural surfactants, this unique cleanser is able to successfully remove impurities and excess oil from the skin surface and pores. Even more, as part of the Antü collection, this product focuses also on protecting the skin from environmental aggressors by removing any particulate matter pollutants from the complexion. 
Although extremely potent, the Antü Refreshing Gel Cleanser does not overdry or irritate the skin. On the contrary, its formula is able to boost moisture retention, preserve the skin barrier and its natural balance. Infused with the exclusive M3™, this cleanser offers, moreover, a soothing and alleviating effect of redness and discomfort. 
To conclude, the Antü Brightening Eye Cream has a vegan composition and is certificated as a cruelty-free product by the Leaping Bunny Program.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply Codex Labs Antü Refreshing Gel Cleanser 125ml (4.23fl oz) as part of your regular morning and evening skincare routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the wet skin of your face and neck with the help of your fingers. Then, gently massage the formula in with rotating movements. Finish by rinsing thoroughly. Discover the remaining Antü Collection to improve your results.

description:
Uriage Thermal Micellar Water Oily Skin is a cleansing water that was specially formulated to remove make-up and impurities from combination to oily skin types, including sensitive ones. In fact, while removing residues from the complexion, this formula is equally capable of balancing the sebum levels on the skin. Even more, it also promotes optimal levels of hydration, preventing dryness during and after the cleansing process. 
All of this benefits are possible thanks to a unique formula that blends multiple active ingredients. On one side, this formula resorts to Non-Ionic Surfactants to effectively dislodge make-up and also impurities from the face and eye area. At the same time, the presence of Uriage Thermal Water is responsible for soothing the skin and relieving sensations of discomfort.The result? The complexion is radiant and refreshed in a single step.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Uriage Thermal Micellar Water Oily Skin  as part of your regular caring routine in the mornings and evenings. Apply by pouring the formula on a cotton pad. Then, gently wipe the skin of the face, eyes and neck to cleanse it. Do not rinse.

description: Topicrem Gentle Micellar Water is an eye and face makeup remover, as well as a gentle skin cleanser. First and foremost, glycerin and betaine boost skin hydration. They do so by reviving the natural radiance by strengthening the surface barrier and preventing the effects of pollution. In addition, allantoin leaves a comfortable, soothed, and clear complexion upon application, ensuring the cleansing process does not disrupt the delicate hydrolipidic mantle. Furthermore, its minimalist formula with only 8 ingredients ensures optimal tolerance even on sensitized or reactive skins, which allows a daily use.
how_to_use:
How to use
Saturate a cotton pad with Topicrem Gentle Micellar Water and sweep around the whole face surface and the areas of the neck where makeup was applied. On the eye area, gently press for a few seconds without tugging and then gently lift off makeup with outward motions.

description:
NUXE Very Rose 3-in-1 Soothing Micellar Water was specially formulated to gently but effectively cleanse the skin. Being an important step in our daily skincare routine, it is important to use a cleanser that respects the natural balance of the skin. With a unique formula that suits all skin types, including sensitive skin, this soothing micellar water can not only remove impurities and make-up, but also soothe and comfort the skin. It contains a combination of botanical origin elements such as Rose Floral Water and the Skin-Respect Complex. These ingredients, besides perfectly cleansing the skin, can also strengthen the skin barrier while soothing and comforting.
With the ability to deeply cleanse, while soothing and comforting, this micellar water protects your skin and leaves it fresh and soothed. And, due to a subtle, fresh, and delicate rose scent, it also enhances your senses and provides you a pleasant sensorial experience.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Very Rose 3-in-1 Soothing Micellar Water  to a cotton pad. Gently wipe the face and eye area and repeat the process if necessary. It does not require rinsing with water.

description:
Mádara Micellar Water cleanses and hydrates your skin deeply, removing everyday impurities as well as make-up effectively. However, it does so without damaging your complexion's natural defensive barrier. Moreover, its carefully selected ingredients balance and smooth the skin for the ultimate feather-like finish. After just one effortless application, it quickly clears the skin's top layers. More precisely, Hyaluronic Acid joins forces with Aloe Vera juice as well as Peony Root extract for wonderful purifying effects. In fact, the antioxidant, calming qualities are perfect to ensure a healthy skincare routine. Basically, these three core components maximize comfort while also fortifying skin tissues so they can improve over time. The final results lead you to a path of radiance and youthfulness that will take you by surprise. In short, this micellar water is a beauty essential that sets the tone for you to receive the benefits of other products. 
Like most of Mádara's cosmetics, this formula remains non-aggressive and suitable for all skin types. Plus, the sensitive areas of your face will appreciate the subtle and 99% natural elements of this miraculous detoxifying water. To the same extent, it preserves sustainability, transparency, and affordability. Indeed, the brand's founders go to great lengths to extract resources consciously, bearing in mind the planet's well-being.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous portion of Mádara Micellar Water onto a tissue or cotton pad and wipe it over your face, eyes, and lips. Be careful to smooth it gently, paying close attention to more sensitive areas. Repeat the process until you feel your complexion is fully cleansed.

description: It'S Skin Have A Greengrape Cleansing Foam offers refreshment as well as optimal hydration to congested skin types. Thus, its strong anti-bacterial properties stunt the development of acne or blemishes, visibly clearing your complexion, increasing radiance. Alcohol-free, this option is water-based, effectively removes sweat, excess sebum, and dirt from the face. Moreover, if applied on a daily basis, this manages to rejuvenate and purify, preserving a healthy moisture level. All in all, thanks to plenty of vitamins, this leaves dull areas looking bright and transparent. Among its key ingredients, it relies heavily on Lauric Acid, Grape Fruit Extract or Trehalose so the skin can achieve a better water-oil balance!
how_to_use:
How to use
Squeeze a moderate amount of It'S Skin Have A Greengrape Cleansing Foam to the palm of your hand. Then, create a rich lather by mixing the formula with water. Perform a delicate massage, spreading the cleanser as evenly as possible in circular motions. Finally, rinse abundantly with room temperature water and continue your normal skincare routine.

description: Nivea Urban Skin Detox Micellar Water is a multi-purpose makeup remover, cleansing as well detoxifying and refreshing all skin types, including mixed ones. In fact, it relies heavily on Organic Green Tea Extract to mattify your appearance, controlling excess sebum production. Meanwhile, the brand's exclusive MicellAIR® complex has a magnet-like effect that catches every bit of dirt, getting rid of all kinds of makeup effectively. In addition, a vegan formula, as well as a bottle made of 96% recycled materials, confers greater sustainability. In other words, it cares for your skin as it does for the planet's well-being. Finally, each application prevents you from scrubbing or damaging the skin and the formula also happens to be fragrance-free!
how_to_use:
How to use
With a cotton pad or reusable alternative, apply Nivea Urban Skin Detox Micellar Water on your face, neck, and cleavage areas. Then, delicately massage the water into the skin to remove all kinds of impurities/makeup, causing a refreshing effect. While doing so, refrain from rubbing and keep your eyes shut. After cleansing, use a moisturizing cream to plump the skin. Finally, remember to shake the water well before using.

description: Nivea Refreshing Wash Gel with Lotus Flower combines soothing botanical extracts with Vitamin E to cleanse the skin delicately. These ingredients not only moisturize deeply but also aid in keeping your complexion's natural balance. To the same extent, their antioxidant properties cast away damaging free radicals, visibly improving your appearance. It is ideal to remove daily make-up as well as impurities effortlessly! Thanks to a fluid texture, this effective vegan facial cleanser does not dry out the skin while caring for it. All in all, a simple massage is enough to liberate the face/neck from products, unraveling one's natural beauty in just a few seconds.
how_to_use:
How to use
Pour a suitable portion of Nivea Refreshing Wash Gel with Lotus Flower onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Alternatively, resort to mixing the formula with water. Then, massage it into your face and neck in circular motions, removing all kinds of makeup as well as impurities. Thanks to its dermatological approval, this even suits the delicate eye area. Wait until the face is completely clean in order to apply your favorite moisturizing cream!

description:
Klorane Stick Mask with Organic Aquatic Mint & Clay 25g (0.88oz) is an innovative and fun way to target excess oil through the power of natural ingredients. Specially developed for combination to oily skin, this original treatment promises to purify your complexion while equally improving skin texture and radiance. It does so through a unique composition that blends the power of two active ingredients that complement each other’s benefits. On one hand, the Organic Aquatic Mint offers a detoxifying and antioxidant action. At the same time, White Clay is able to absorb excess oil, clearing the pores and smoothing the skin. Bearing all this in mind, with 100% of ingredients from a natural origin, the Klorane Stick Mask is highly efficient when it comes to achieving refreshed and overall improved skin.
As a last note, it is also important to mention that this is a flexible product that offers effortless and quick utilization. You may choose to apply this mask to your whole face or enjoy a targeted treatment on specific areas. Moreover, with a blue composition, the Klorane Stick Mask comes off easily with lukewarm water.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Klorane Stick Mask with Organic Aquatic Mint & Clay 25g (0.88oz) on your whole face or as a targeted treatment on specific problematic areas like the T-Zone. Apply it by sliding the stick directly on the skin and using the fingers to ensure an even distribution of the product. Then, let it act from 5 to 20 minutes. Finish by rinsing thoroughly with lukewarm water. Complement with other products from the same range for optimal results.

description: Sensilis Micellar Water [AR] 400ml (13.52 fl oz)  is a gentle micellar water which is suitable for all skin types, including both sensitive and reactive skins.  Not only does this star product cleanse the skin and remove makeup, but it also contributes to tone, hydrate, and calm the skin. Thus, it attenuates redness and strengthens the skin barrier. In short, it's the perfect complement to any skincare routine!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Micellar Water [AR] 400ml (13.52 fl oz) with a cotton pad on the previously moistened face, until the makeup is completely removed.

description: Erborian Black Soap is a facial soap that provides the skin with a deep and gentle cleanse. Formulated with a gentle plant-derived cleansing base, as well as purifying charcoal, this soap helps rid the skin of impurities and dead cells with a comfortable creamy foam. As a result, the skin emerges clean and luminous after cleansing, with a velvety-soft, natural-looking matte finish.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Erborian Black Soap to the face, then massage to obtain a cleansing foam. Massage gently, then rinse thoroughly.

description: NUXE Very Rose Light Cleansing Foam is a gentle and practical cleanser that you can quickly apply during shower. With a formula that respects the natural balance of the skin, it is able to not only effectively remove impurities but also, in the process, take care of your skin. Containing Rose Floral Water, it has the ability to both soothe and soften all skin types. And, the presence of a Skin-Respect Complex, that consists in a combination of botanical-origin sugars, allows it to keep the skin hydrated while strengthening its protective barrier. Having a subtle, fresh, and delicate rose scent this light and creamy foam can provide you a unique sensorial experience. Protecting from dryness while soothing and softening the skin it will provide you a wonderful feeling of both freshness and comfort.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Very Rose Light Cleansing Foam to damp face both morning and evening avoiding the eye contour area. Gently massage and then thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water.

description: NUXE BIO Organic Moringa Seeds Micellar Cleansing Water is a beautifully fragrant micellar water that effectively removes make-up and impurities. The perfect first step in any skincare routine, this micellar water offers unique benefits depending on whether you apply it in the morning or evening. In the morning, it cleanses the skin while preparing it for the rest of your products; in the evening, it removes make-up and eliminates impurities and pollution particles from the skin. The star ingredient in this formula, moringa seed extract, is especially ideal for this task, due to its ability to attract pollution particles and facilitate their removal. With a lightweight texture and a subtle floral fragrance, this micellar water suits all skin types and skincare routines, creating a perfectly fresh and radiant base for the rest of your skincare routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE BIO Organic Moringa Seeds Micellar Cleansing Water to a cotton pad, then wipe over your face and eyes. Repeat until the cotton pad is clear of any make-up or impurities.

description: Garnier Rose Micellar Cleansing Water Sensitive Skin 400ml (13.53fl oz) is an effective, gentle and easy to use micellar water recommended for cleaning and removing make-up of dull and sensitive skin, that also reveal skin's glow. Suitable for all skin types, even dry, sensitive skin. this micellar rose water is possible to remove make-up, impurities and dirt, all the while brightening dull and sensitive skin. Enriched with micelles, this water will lift make-up, impurities and dirt away from skin, without leaving skin dry. This efficient formula, yet gentle cleanser removes even waterproof and longwear make-up while nourishing the skin. Also contains Rose Water, which offers a satisfying scent, while boosting skin's glow thanks to its brightening properties. As a result, skin is left clean, radiant and glowing.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Garnier Rose Micellar Cleansing Water Sensitive Skin 400ml (13.53fl oz) with the help of a cotton pad and wipe the face, eye contour and lips, removing all the dirt from the facial skin. No rinsing required.

description: Evolve Daily Detox Facial Wash 100ml (3.38fl oz) is a foaming gel that gently cleanses and purifies the skin. Formulated with antioxidant Goji Berries and anti-pollution Moringa Peptides, this facial wash is ideal for skin that is constantly exposed to pollution and other environmental aggressions. Not only does it provide a delicate cleansing action by lifting away impurities and pollution particles, but also helps balance the skin by removing excess oil. Perfect for combination and oily skin types, this product feels like a reset button for your skin. Massage onto damp skin, lather up, and rinse thoroughly; after just three steps, your skin will emerge with newfound softness and smoothness! Moreover, this formula is fragranced with fresh aloe vera, so you get a real sense of just how clean, pure, and comfortable your skin can feel.
how_to_use:
How to use
Massage Evolve Daily Detox Facial Wash 100ml (3.38fl oz) onto the damp skin of the face and neck and gently lather the product onto the skin to remove excess oil and impurities. Then rinse thoroughly.

description:
Fillerina Gentle Micellar Lotion 200ml (6.76floz) has an innovative formula that incorporates Fillerina's patented skincare expertise with 12 hyaluronic acids, which offer unmatched hydration, elasticity, and smoothness. Furthermore, the formula features minerals, trace elements, and microbiomic components that support the health and natural balance of the skin. At the same time, the inclusion of softening ingredients such as panthenol ensures maximum comfort and care, particularly for dry and delicate skin. As a result, this lotion gently yet effectively removes makeup and impurities without disrupting the skin's natural balance.
This lotion is distinguished by its toning properties, leaving the skin clean, soft, and radiant after every use. With its micelles capturing and lifting away dirt and makeup with ease, the lotion ensures a thorough cleanse suitable for the entire face, including the delicate eye area. In summary, this micellar lotion not only cleans the skin but also imbues it with a sense of renewed softness and luminosity, making it an indispensable daily cleansing solution for all skin types.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Fillerina Gentle Micellar Lotion 200ml (6.76floz) onto the face with a cotton pad or reusable alternative, including the eye area. Repeat if necessary. Then, rinse with water. Can be used on its own or after using the cleansing cream from the brand.

description:
Frezyderm Ac-Norm Active Foam Plus 150ml (5.0floz) is a specially formulated cleanser that addresses the unique needs of acne-prone skin. Uniquely formulated, this active foam delivers gentle yet effective cleansing. It stands out in its ability to effectively remove excess oil, daily dirt, pollutants, and makeup, while simultaneously providing targeted acne treatment. Another key point is its versatility! It is suitable for all types of acne-prone skin, catering to a range of acne severity from mild to severe. Also, it's a great choice for those undergoing acne treatment or post-medical sessions for acne. And it can be applied on the face, back, and chest, making it a versatile solution for full-body acne treatment. Lastly, depending on the application method, it can provide either a mild or enhanced action.
Its distinctive composition not only cleanses the skin but also leaves it feeling comfortably hydrated. With active ingredients such as AHA, zinc PCA, and capryloyl glycine, it offers an antimicrobial and sebum-regulating action.  On the other hand, Deepsan in the formula plays a significant role in reducing skin discomfort and irritation. In summary, this balanced formulation offers effective cleansing, treatment, and soothing properties, ensuring that the skin remains healthy, clear, and comfortable.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Frezyderm Ac-Norm Active Foam Plus 150ml (5.0floz) twice a day on the face, back and chest. For mild action, apply on wet skin, massage to lather, and then rinse with water. For enhanced action, especially targeting more severe acne conditions, apply on wet skin, massage to lather, and then remove with a tissue.

description:
Codex Labs Bia Gentle Cleansing Oil 30ml (1.0floz) is a facial cleanser that offers a gentle yet effective cleansing and makeup removal experience. To begin with, this formula features a blend of soothing and protective oils such as blackcurrant and borage. These oils will serve a dual function: to cleanse and to nourish. As such, this cleanser is designed to remove impurities and makeup with ease, without stripping the skin moisture barrier. At the same time, it maintains the delicate balance of removing impurities and skin hydration, making it ideal for daily use and suitable for all skin types. Still, it is especially beneficial for those with dry, flaky, or itchy skin, as it helps to soothe and nourish the skin. Clinical studies show increased hydration with softer and more elastic skin, while also reporting a reduction in skin scaliness, showcasing the product's ability to promote a smoother complexion.
Furthermore, this cleanser presents a lightweight oil-based milk texture. This texture transforms as you massage the product in damp skin, dissolving makeup and impurities that are effectively removed from the skin. All while ensuring the skin remains hydrated and balanced. In summary, this product blends cleansing efficiency and hydrating benefits to gently cleanse without irritation.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Oils from blackcurrant, borage, sunflower, and plum for example, are rich in fatty acids and vitamin E, nourishing the skin to keep optimal hydration levels.
how_to_use:
How to use
Shake before use. Apply a small amount of Codex Labs Bia Gentle Cleansing Oil 30ml (1.0floz) to wet skin and massage in circular motions. Then, rinse with water.

description:
Juice To Cleanse Grain Water Cleansing Oil 200ml (6.76 fl oz) is a uniquely formulated skincare product that stands out for its lightweight consistency and comprehensive cleansing capabilities. This innovative oil effectively removes all types of makeup, including waterproof products and long-lasting foundations, as well as sunscreen residues, dirt, and impurities. At the heart of this formula are rice bran and oat kernel oils, which not only provide cleansing properties but also offer soothing and nourishing benefits to the skin. Although this product is an oil, it is so light that it becomes a versatile choice for all skin types. As a matter of fact, the formula also provides pore care and gentle dead skin removal with Pore Complex 3, lemon, and papaya fruit extracts. This attribute makes this oil an excellent option for oily or acne-prone skin types, which are prone to clogged pores and blackheads.
Additionally, Platolwhite-C offers brightening properties and the Juicy Pure blend contributes to a healthy and vibrant complexion. In summary, what sets this cleansing oil apart is its ability to deeply cleanse the skin while presenting a lightweight texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Juice To Cleanse Grain Water Cleansing Oil 200ml (6.76 fl oz) to the face and massage to melt makeup and impurities. Add some water to emulsify and massage. Lastly, rinse off with water.

description:
Juice To Cleanse Calming Clean Water 300ml (10.1 fl oz) is a micellar water that cleanses the skin gently yet effectively. Formulated with the utmost respect for the skin, this product doesn't leave the skin feeling dry, tight, or even irritated. On the contrary, it ensures a soothing and hydrating experience. Basically, its unique formula is engineered to attract and dissolve dirt, makeup, and impurities effortlessly, functioning like a magnet. Furthermore, it is slightly acidic, with a pH ranging between 5 and 5.5, which is closely aligned with the natural pH of the skin. This special formulation ensures that it is gentle on the eyes and does not cause irritation or stinging, making it suitable for those with sensitive skin or eyes.
Additionally, the product features a unique blend of natural extracts and ingredients, typical of the brand, that are key to its effectiveness and gentleness. These ingredients work in harmony to soothe the skin and protect its barrier function, consequently ensuring that your skin remains calm and comfortable after cleansing. As a matter of fact, the multifunctional properties of this product make it an excellent choice for the cleansing step. It efficiently removes makeup, cleanses the skin of impurities, soothes any irritation, and hydrates, all in one step. In summary, this cleansing water offers a gentle yet powerful solution for daily skin cleansing. Its pH-balanced formula, enriched with natural extracts, provides a soothing, hydrating experience, making it an excellent choice for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Pear, cauliflower, cabbage, and coconut extracts, along with aloe vera juice work to hydrate and soothe the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Pour Juice To Cleanse Calming Clean Water 300ml (10.1 fl oz) onto a cotton/reusable pad and then gently swipe it across the face to clean the skin and/or remove makeup.

description:
RVB LAB Microbioma 3-In-1 Micellar Milk-Cream 250ml (8.5 fl oz) is a multifunctional skincare product designed to cater to the needs of sensitive and stressed skin. Utilizing the innovative ReviBiome System, this milk-cream formulation combines prebiotics, probiotics, and microbiome boosters to not only cleanse the skin but also strengthen its barrier functions. Betaine, another key ingredient, contributes to the product's ability to hydrate the skin, ensuring that it remains soft, supple, and well-moisturized after cleansing. At the same time, this cleanser removes all types of impurities and makeup, including waterproof and long-lasting.
Moreover, offering gentle yet effective cleansing this product suits individuals with dry, dehydrated, or irritated skin, including those affected by medical treatments such as chemotherapy or conditions like inflammatory acne. It is particularly ideal for those with normal to dry and sensitive skin types. In summary, this product cleanses, hydrates, and fortifies the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply RVB LAB Microbioma 3-In-1 Micellar Milk-Cream 250ml (8.5 fl oz) with a cotton pad or reusable alternative and massage gently with circular motions. No need to rinse.
