description: JOWAÉ Micellar Cleansing Water 400ml (13.53fl oz) is a cleansing water suitable for even the most sensitive skins. In fact, infused with Imperial Peony, this special formula has powerful soothing properties and is ideal to gently cleanse the skin. Furthermore, its composition also contains Antioxidant Lumiphenols – a patented active ingredient that increases the skin resilience against external aggressions and pollution, improving levels of radiance, simultaneously. Lastly, the presence of Glycerine is responsible for providing extra comfort and an emollient complex. The result? You’ll be able to enjoy a delicate cleansing action that leaves your skin looking and also feeling refreshingly radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use JOWAÉ Micellar Cleansing Water 400ml (13.53fl oz) as part of your regular morning and evening routine as a cleansing step. Start by pouring the formula onto a cotton pad. Then, gently wipe all impurities from the skin. Repeat the process until the cotton pad comes out clean.

description: Galénic Pur Micellar Cleansing Water Face & Eyes is a cleansing micellar water used to remove impurities and make-up from face and eyes in a single gesture. Its effectiveness and softness are achieved with micellar microstructures, which transport the cleansing ingredients to the impurities on the skin. Sebum and make-up get imprisoned in the center of the micelles, while the Melilotus Floral Water gently cleanses and reduces skin irritations. The skin gets slightly fragranced, fresh and comforted.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Galénic Pur Micellar Cleansing Water Face & Eyes on the face, neck, and eyes with a cotton pad.

description: JOWAÉ Purifying Cleansing Gel is a cleansing gel suitable for oily to combination skin that purifies and refines the texture of the skin. This formula has sacred lotus, that has astringent properties and is able to tighten dilated pores. This gel gently purifies the skin, leaving it oil-free and refining the texture. The skin becomes clean, detoxified and smoother, thanks to the combination of active ingredients.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply JOWAÉ Purifying Cleansing Gel on wet skin and gently massage to lather, avoiding the eye contour. Rinse with water.

description:
Shiseido Essentials Clarifying Cleansing Foam is the ultimate purifier, ridding your face of impurities and a multitude of dull skin-related issues. Several Japanese ingredients make it the ideal first step for your self-care routine. It regenerates the facial skin delicately and enhances its protective barrier. All the more, it can either prepare your skin for urban environments or the most desired beauty sleep.
Plus, this dermatologically-tested cleansing foam is truly inclusive, as it suits all skin types. After feeling its effects, your skin will be like a blank canvas. Feel free to apply a Shiseido softener afterward.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a tiny portion of Shiseido Clarifying Cleansing Foam on the palm of your hand. Mixture it with a bit of cold or room temperature water to activate the foam. Clear the skin and rinse your face abundantly, afterward.

description: Clinique Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin Formula is a dermatologist-developed liquid soap that cleanses oily and oily combination skin gently, yet thoroughly. The delicate formula removes dirt and debris from the skin, all the while protecting the skin's natural moisture balance. The refreshing gel texture, which is especially suitable for oilier skin types, contains hyaluronic acid and aloe vera, both of which contribute to retain moisture in the skin. The skin emerges clean, yet comfortable, without the feeling of tightness often associated with cleansing products.
how_to_use:
How to use
After removing your make-up, lather Clinique Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin Formula between your hands using tepid water. Then, massage the product over the face and neck using gentle circular motions. Finally, rinse thoroughly and pat dry.

description: Clinique Liquid Facial Soap Extra Mild is a dermatologist-developed liquid soap that cleanses dry skin gently, yet thoroughly. The delicate formula removes dirt and debris from the skin, all the while protecting the skin's natural moisture balance. The creamy texture, which is especially suitable for dry to very dry skin types, contains hyaluronic acid and olive fruit oil, both of which contribute to retain moisture in the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
After removing your make-up, lather Clinique Liquid Facial Soap Extra Mild between your hands using tepid water. Then, massage the product over the face and neck using gentle circular motions. Finally, rinse thoroughly and pat dry.

description: Clinique Rinse Off Eye Make-Up Solvent is a powerful eye make-up remover that allows for easy make-up touch-ups. This is the perfect product for those occasions where you just need to refresh your eye make-up without disturbing the rest of your complexion; simply apply the product to a cotton pad or swab, then sweep gently over the eyes. The liquid formula instantly dissolves the make-up, removing it cleanly and without a trace. As a result, the skin around the eyes is clean and refreshed, like a blank canvas for the rest of your beauty routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clinique Rinse Off Eye Make-Up Solvent to a cotton pad or cotton swab, then sweep gently over the eye make-up you wish to remove. Tissue off once done, or rinse with water.

description:
Shiseido Essentials Extra Rich Cleansing Milk is a lightweight cleansing and hydrating lotion conceived to help you get rid of everyday impurities. It increases the skin's protective barriers from the very first applications and smooths facial texture. All the more, thanks to a few selected anti-inflammatory ingredients, it provides a sense of freshness, allowing the skin to breathe.
Finally, you'll be able to achieve a luminous, healthier look, preventing further damage to sensitive areas. This cleansing milk will quickly become a must in your daily routine, as it leaves dry skin feeling nourished.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Shiseido Essentials Extra Rich Cleansing Milk by pressing the dispenser twice into your hand. Next, mix it with a bit of cold or room temperature water to create foam. Clean your skin deeply, spreading it evenly on your face. Lastly, wash out the product delicately. If you wish, also apply a tiny amount of softener afterward to complete the cleansing process.

description:
Shiseido Essentials Deep Cleansing Foam targets acne-prone skin-related issues with precision and offers the possibility of a healthier, brighter look. This cleanser marks the beginning of a better beauty regime as it detoxifies the skin and clears imperfections away. Furthermore, it goes to the root of problems surrounding oiliness control, the appearance of blackheads, or excessive sebum production. It contains a miraculous formula that moisturizes and softens rough areas without being too aggressive, exfoliating just the right spots.
Finally, it also allows your skin to breathe fully, removing unwanted obstacles of all sorts.
how_to_use:
How to use
Put a tiny amount of Shiseido Essentials Deep Cleansing Foam on the palm of your hand Then, add a. bit of cold or room temperature water to the foam, allowing it to create bubbles. Clear the skin and rinse your face abundantly, afterward. For further results, also use Shiseido's Treatment Softener.

description: Flormar Makeup Remover Wet Wipes For Normal & Dry Skin is a great effortless makeup removing solution for normal to dry skin. In fact, these wipes are suitable not only for the face but equally for the lip and eye area. Through a gentle application, this product will cleanse your face so that your skin feels refreshed. Moreover, its moisturizing formula nourishes the skin and consequently prevents an over-drying effect. While it cleans any trace of makeup or impurities, this infused with Olus Oil and Aloe Vera formula, will additionally nourish your skin providing, as a result, a soft and smooth touch. The Flormar Makeup Remover Wet Wipes For Normal & Dry Skin are, to sum up, a gentle and quick way to get read of all makeup residue.
how_to_use:
How to use
Place one wipe from the Flormar Makeup Remover Wet Wipes For Normal & Dry Skin on the designated area. Press gently to breakdown make-up and wipe carefully. After use, rinse off the skin with water.

description: Flormar Clean Care Makeup Wet Wipes is a must-have on your bag if you are looking for a quick and easy way to remove makeup on the go. Like so, this is a perfect solution to use throughout the day or to incorporate into your evening skincare routine. Suitable for all skin types, the Flormar Clean Care Makeup Wet Wipes deeply cleanses your pores and equally removes all traces of makeup and impurities. Furthermore, this glycerine-infused formula, while cleansing your skin will additionally moisturize it. In fact, Glycerine is an amazing moisturizing ingredient that can absorb and retain water leaving, therefore, a fresh but nourishing feeling. Ultimately, the Flormar Clean Care Makeup Wet Wipes will let your pores breathe again offering a hydrated soft result preventing, however, an oily finish.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Glycerine is an intensive moisturizing ingredient that absorbs and retains water.
how_to_use:
How to use
Place one wipe from the Flormar Clean Care Makeup Wet Wipes on the designated area. Press gently to breakdown make-up and wipe carefully. After use, rinse off the skin with water.

description: Flormar Face Cleansing Brush will take your night skin routine to a whole new level. In fact, the Flormar Face Cleansing Brush helps you to deep cleanse your pores removing any left trace of makeup and dirt. After cleaning your face with your favorite products, use this brush with circular motions. Start by using the silicone side, and follow up with the brush side. Watch how your skin feels much cleaner and fresher at the end. Furthermore, your complexion will also look healthier and more glowy over time. The Flormar Face Cleansing Brush is suitable for all skin types and all kinds of cleansing products. However, if you have sensitive skin, be extra gentle when massaging your face with this brush.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use 
Start by removing your makeup and cleaning your face with your favorite cleansing products. Then, for a deeper cleanser, use the Flormar Face Cleansing Brush. First, use the silicone side, gently massaging the face with circular motions. Follow up with the brush side using the same type of movements.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

Pestle & Mortar Erase Balm Cleanser 50ml
Pestle & Mortar Renew Gel Cleanser 50ml
Pestle & Mortar Double Sided Face Cloth x1

Pestle & Mortar Erase Balm Cleanser is the first step of your double cleansing routine. With this in mind, the brand has created a super smooth balm made of all-natural ingredients which removes all traces of make-up and SPF. This balmy cleanser melts into a luxurious oil that smooth over your skin in order to dissolve all impurities and gently remove them from the skin. What's more, given the amazing blend of natural oils, this balm ensures that the skin is hydrated even during the cleansing process. This time, you will be able to transform a usually harsh process into the first step of caring for your skin, thus ensuring that the skin is nourished during the process. Given that this product is made of natural oils, please keep in mind that the texture might differ from batch to batch and even due to environmental factors, so if your balm looks a bit grainy, it's still totally safe to use and will give you the same results. Read more about Pestle & Mortar Erase Balm Cleanser here.
Pestle & Mortar Renew Gel Cleanser is your second cleanser for your double cleansing routine. First, this incredibly smooth gel-in-oil has a thick texture that glides onto the skin to deeply cleanse it. Given that this product should be applied onto dry skin, the formula contains a super blend of natural extracts including papaya, known for its enzymes which gently exfoliate the skin. Moreover, the addition of superoxide dismutase boosts your skin's defenses against free radicals, known for causing premature aging. Thus, this formula gently cleanses the skin, improves the skin tone, unblocks pores and is suitable for every skin type. Read more about Pestle & Mortar Renew Gel Cleanser here.
Pestle & Mortar Double Sided Face Cloths are 100% cotton double sided washcloths. These flannels help to improve the results of your cleansing routine, as they have been designed especially for those who use the double cleansing method, but are suitable for everyone. These cloths have two different sides that are compatible with different cleansing stages: one of the sides is a naturally exfoliating one, designed for the first cleanse stage; the other side is smooth-textured to improve the second stage of cleansing. Read more about Pestle & Mortar Double Sided Face Cloth here.

description:
Holika Holika Sparkling Lemon Cleansing Water belongs to a skincare range enriched with 16 minerals, clearing the skin while preserving its moisture barrier. This liquid formula achieves such balance thanks to the presence of Vitamin C, a powerful antioxidant. In fact, this ingredient counteracts duller complexions by producing collagen as well as preventing photo-aging. Meanwhile, its fluid texture casts away daily impurities - including makeup - creating a polished, fresh, and completely detoxified appearance.
Moreover, it relies on thermal water (Onsen-Su) from a hot spring to cleanse pores as effectively as possible, inhibiting breakouts/skin inflammations. Besides unclogging enlarged pores, this manages to tighten them, regulating excess sebum production, thus helping you avoid greasiness. To the same extent, Lemon Fruit Extract brightens the epidermis, increasing elasticity and targeting eczema as well as other skin conditions. Finally, Biosaccharides soften the skin, establishing a discreet moisturizing film that protects against further external threats, relieving irritation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of Holika Holika Sparkling Lemon Cleansing Water on a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, wipe the skin as gently and evenly as possible, performing circular as well as upward motions. Finally, don't forget to explore the rest of the Holika Holika Sparkling Lemon to see what other options appeal to you.

description:
Flormar Eye Makeup Removal Pads With Aloe Vera gently breaks-down even the most stubborn eye makeup. In fact, infused with Aloe Vera, this makeup removing solution helps you remove every trace of dark makeup without irritating your skin. Moreover, this product not only cleanses your eye area as also helps moisturize it providing, as a result, a fresh but smooth effect.
To sum up, the Flormar Eye Makeup Removal Pads With Aloe Vera are an easy and equally gentle makeup-remover, perfect to quickly clean your eyes on-the-go.
how_to_use:
How to use
Gently massage your eye area with a pad from Flormar Eye Makeup Removal Pads With Aloe Vera.

description: Weleda Gentle Cleansing Foam is a delicate cleanser that purifies the skin without drying it out. Especially formulated for normal to combination skin, this gentle face wash is able to remove excess sebum, daily impurities, and make-up in the kindest, most effective way. Even though it offers a deep, thorough cleansing action, it doesn't disturb the skin barrier. As a result, it leaves the skin's moisture balance undisturbed. This ability is due to its all-natural composition, which combines organic witch hazel extract with the fresh, uplifting fragrances of various essential oils. The lightweight mousse texture washes away the grime of a long day, leaving only beautiful, naturally refined skin. Fresh, soft, and comfortable, the skin is perfectly prepared for the skincare that will follow.
how_to_use:
How to use
In the morning and evening, dispense Weleda Gentle Cleansing Foam onto your fingertips or a damp cotton pad. Then, apply the product to the damp skin of the face and neck, while taking care to avoid the eye area. Finally, rinse thoroughly with warm water.
